sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: Nga 5 Ogwokubiri, Bill ne Melinda Gates baalangirira obuyambi bwa bukadde bwa doola 100 eri ekitongole kya WHO okukola ku kunoonyereza kw’eddagala erigema n’okukola ku bujjanjabi wamu n’okukuuma "abantu abali mu buzibu mu Afrika ne South Asia".
translated: Nga 5 February, Bill ne Melinda Gates baalangirira okuwaayo obukadde bwa ddoola 100 eri ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu eky'ensi yonna okusonda ssente z'okunoonyereza ku kugema n'okujjanjaba wamu n'okukuuma "abantu abali mu bulabe mu Afrika ne South Asia".

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: Interaksyon kyategeeza nti gavumenti ya China yagabira eggwanga lya Philippines obukookolo 200,000 nga 6 Ogwokubiri nga Omubaka Richard Gordon amaze okuweereza obukookolo obukadde 3.16 mu Wuhan.
translated: Interaksyon yategeezezza nti gavumenti ya China yawaayo masiki 200,000 eri Philippines nga 6 February, oluvannyuma lwa Senator Richard Gordon okusindika masiki obukadde busatu n’obukadde 16 e Wuhan.

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: Nga 19 Ogwokubiri, Ekitongole kya Red Cross mu Singapore kyalangirira nti kigenda kusindika obuyambi obubalirirwamu obukadde $2.26 mu China.
translated: Nga 19 February, ekitongole kya Singapore Red Cross kyalangirira nti kigenda kusindika obuyambi bwa ddoola obukadde 2.26 mu China.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: Japan yawaayo obukookolo akakadde kamu eri Wuhan, Turkey yawaayo ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba, Russia yaweereza ttani z’ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba ezisukka mu 13 mu Wuhan, Malaysia yalangirira nti ewadde China obukadde bwa giraavu 18, Germany yatwala ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba ebyenjawulo omuli Hazmat suits 10,000, ate America yawa China ttani 17.8 ez’ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba era n’esuubiza okwongerayo obukadde bwa ssente $100 okuyamba amawanga agaali gakoseddwa. Obulwadde bwe bugenze nga bukendeera mu China, China yo ebadde eweereza obuyambi mu mawanga ag’enjawulo agakoseddwa nawookeera ono.
translated: Japan yawaddeyo masiki za ffeesi obukadde bumu mu kibuga Wuhan, Turkey n’esindika ebyuma ebikozesebwa mu by’obujjanjabi, Russia yasindika ttani z’obujjanjabi ezisoba mu 13 e Wuhan, Malaysia yalangiridde okuwaayo ggalavu z’obujjanjabi obukadde 18 eri China, Germany n’etuusa eby’obujjanjabi eby’enjawulo omuli essuuti za Hazmat emitwalo 10, n’e... Amerika yawaddeyo China ttani z’eddagala 17.8 n’esuubiza okwongera obukadde bwa doola 100 mu kuwagira amawanga agakoseddwa.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Mu Gwokusatu, China, Chuba ne Russia baaweereza ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba n’abakugu okuyamba ku Italy ku coronavirus eyali abaluseewo.
translated: Mu March, China, Cuba ne Russia zaasindika eby’obujjanjabi n’abakugu okuyamba Italy okukola ku bulwadde bwayo obwa coronavirus.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: Munnabizinesi Jack Ma yaweereza ebikozesebwa mu kukebera akakadde 1.1, obukookolo obukadde 6, n’obuganduula 60,000 mu Addis Ababa, Ethiopia African Union ebigabe.
translated: Omusuubuzi Jack Ma yasindika ebikozesebwa mu kukebera obukadde 1.1, masiki mu maaso obukadde 6, n’essuuti ezikuuma emitwalo 60 mu kibuga Addis Ababa ekya Ethiopia okuzigabira omukago gwa Afrika.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: Oluvannyuma yaweereza ebikozesebwa mu kukebera 5,000, obukookolo 100,000 n’ebyuma ebiyambako mu kussa 5 mu Panama.
translated: Oluvannyuma yasindika ebyuma ebikebera omubiri emitwalo etaano, masiki mu maaso 100,000 n’ebyuma 5 eby’okussa e Panama.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: Ma era yawaayo ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba eri Canada. Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, ne Czech Republic beemulugunya ku bukookolo n’ebikozesebwa mu kukebera ebikolerwa mu China.
translated: Ma era yawaddeyo eby’obujjanjabi eri Canada.Budaaki, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, ne Czech Republic balaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku masiki n’ebikozesebwa mu kukebera ebikoleddwa Abachina.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: Okugeza, Spain yasazaamu ebikozesebwa mu kukebera coronavirus 58,000 ebikolebwa mu China nga bino obutuukirivu bwabyo bwali bwa bitundu 30% byokka, so nga Netherlands yasazaamu obukookolo bw’e China 600,000 obwali obufu.
translated: Okugeza Spain yaggyeyo ebyuma ebikebera coronavirus 58,000 ebyakolebwa China nga bituufu ebitundu 30% byokka, mu kiseera kye kimu, Budaaki yazzaayo masiki za ffeesi 600,000 ez’Abachina ezaali tezirina buzibu.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: Belgium yasazaamu obukookolo 100,000 obwali tebusobola kukozesebwa, nga bulowoozebwa nga bwava China, naye nga mu butuufu bwali buva Colombia.
translated: Bubirigi yajjukizza masiki 100,000 ezitakozesebwa, nga kirowoozebwa nti za China, kyokka mu butuufu zaali za Colombia.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: Ku ludda olulala, Obuyambi bwa China bwayanirizibwa bulungi mu bitundu by’e Latin America ne mu Africa. Nga 2 Ogwokuna, Banka y’Ensi Yonna yatongoza obuyambi obw’amangu eri amawanga agakyakula.
translated: Ate obuyambi bwa China bubadde bufunye nnyo mu bitundu bya Latin America ne Africa.Nga 2 April, Banka y’ensi yonna yatongoza ebikwekweto by’okuyamba amawanga agakyakula mu bwangu.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: WHO etenderezza kaweefube wa China mu ngeri gy’ekuttemu n’okulwanyisa obulwadde.
translated: Ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu ekya WHO kisiimye kaweefube w’abakulira China mu kuddukanya n’okuziyiza ssenyiga ono.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: WHO yazuula enjawulo wakati w’obulwadde bwa SARS obwabalukawo mu 2002–2004, nga ku olwo abakulembeze ba China balumirizibwa okusirikira ebyama ekyalemesa kaweefube w’okubwewala n’okubulwanyisa, n’ekizibu ekiriwo kati nga gavumenti ya wakati "etegeeza abantu buli kiseera okwewala okubuguutana mu kwetegekera eggandaalo ly’okuyingira omwaka omupya (Lunar New Year holidays)".
translated: Ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu ekya WHO kyategedde enjawulo eriwo wakati w’ekirwadde kya SARS ekyabalukawo mu 2002–2004, ab’obuyinza mu China mwe bavunaanibwa eby’ekyama ekyalemesezza kaweefube w’okuziyiza n’okuziyiza, n’obuzibu obuliwo kati nga gavumenti eya wakati "ewaddeyo ebipya buli kiseera okwewala okutya ng’ennaku enkulu z’omwaka omuggya ogw’omwezi tezinnabaawo”. .

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: Nga 23 Janwali, ng’ayanukula eky’abakungu ba gavumenti okusalawo okuyimiriza entambula mu Wuhan, omukiise wa WHO Gauden Galea yagamba nti “newankubadde WHO si ye yakisalawo”, kyali “kikolwa kirungi nnyo era nga kiraga okwewaayo okulwanyisa obulwadde mu kitundu mwe businze okwegiriisiza” era n’akyogerako nga “ekyali kitabangawo mu byafaayo byobujjanjabi”. Nga 30 Janwali, ng’okusiigibwa okuva ku muntu okudda ku mulala kumaze okukakasibwa ebweru wa China era nga n’omuwendo gw’abalwadde gweyongera mu mawanga amalala, WHO yalangirira nti obulwadde buno kyali Kizibu kya Byabulamu eky’Ensi Yonna ekyetaaga Okufiibwako mu Bwangu (Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC)), nga kino kyamukaaga okuva ekitegeero kino bwe kyassibwawo bwe waabalukawo ekirwadde ky’omusujja gw’embizzi mu 2009.
translated: Nga 23 January, mu kwanukula ab’obuyinza mu masekkati okusalawo okussa mu nkola envumbo y’entambula mu kibuga Wuhan, omukiise w’ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu Gauden Galea yategeeza nti wadde nga “mazima ddala si kuteesa WHO kw’ekoze”, era “kikulu nnyo ekiraga nti... okwewaayo okuziyiza ekirwadde kino mu kifo we kisinga okubeera" n'akiyita "ekitabangawo mu byafaayo by'ebyobulamu by'abantu".Nga 30 January, oluvannyuma lw'okukakasa okusaasaana okuva mu bantu okudda mu bantu ebweru wa China n'okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde mu birala amawanga, ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu ekya WHO kyalangirira nti ekirwadde kino kya Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), PHEIC ey’omukaaga bukya nkola eno yasooka kukozesebwa mu kiseera ky’obulwadde bwa ssennyiga w’embizzi mu 2009.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: Omukulu wa WHO Tedros Adhanom yagamba nti PHEIC kino kyava ku "buzibu bw’okusaasaana mu nsi yonna, naddala mu mawanga amankuseere (low- and middle-income countries) agatalina byabujjanjabi birungi.
translated: Dayirekita w’ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu eky’ensi yonna, Tedros Adhanom yagambye nti PHEIC yavudde ku “bulabe bw’okusaasaana kw’ensi yonna naddala mu mawanga agalina ssente entono n’eza wakati agatalina nkola za bya bulamu nnywevu.”

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: Ng’ayanukula ku ky’okuyimiriza ebyentambula, Tedros yagamba nti "tewali nsonga lwaki ebyentambula n’ebyobusuubuzi mu nsi yonna bimala gataataaganyizibwa" era nti "WHO tewagira kya kukendeeza busuubuzi na ntambula."
translated: Mu kwanukula okussa mu nkola obukwakkulizo ku ntambula, Tedros yategeezezza nti "tewali nsonga lwaki waliwo ebikolwa ebiyingirira entambula n'obusuubuzi bw'ensi yonna mu ngeri eteetaagisa" era nti "WHO tewa magezi kukoma ku busuubuzi n'entambula."

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: Nga 5 Ogwokubiri, WHO yawanjagira abantu mu nsi yonna okuwaayo obukadde bwa doola 675 okuvujjirira okweteekateeka mu mawanga amankuseere, n’alaga nti kyali kyetaagisa mu bwangu okuwagira amawanga ago "agatalina nkola za kuzuula bantu bakwatiddwa kawuka, singa kaba kabaluseewo ".
translated: Nga 5 February, WHO yalaajanidde ensi yonna okuwaayo obukadde bwa ddoola 675 okusonda ssente z'okwetegekera enteekateeka mu mawanga agafuna ssente entono, ng'elaga obwangu bw'okuwagira amawanga ago "agatalina nkola eziteekeddwawo okuzuula abantu abafunye akawuka kano." , ne bwe kiba nga kyali kigenda kuvaayo".

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: Tedros era yalangirira nti "amaanyi gaffe genkanankana n’awo we tusinga okubeerera abanafu" era n’asaba abantu mu nsi yonna "okusiga leero oba okusasula ekinene gye bujja". Nga 11 Ogwokubiri, WHO mu lukuŋŋaana lw’amawulire yalangirira COVID-19 ng’erinnya ly’obulwadde buno.
translated: Tedros yayongedde okukola ebigambo ng'alangirira nti "tuli ba maanyi nnyo ng'omukago gwaffe ogunafu" era n'asaba ensi yonna "okuteeka ssente leero oba okusasula ebisingawo oluvannyuma".Nga 11 February, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire kyassaawo COVID-19 ng'erinnya lya... obulwadde buno.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: Ku lunaku lwe lumu olwo, Tedros yagamba nti Ssaabawandiisi w’Ekibiina ky’Amawanga Amagatte António Guterres yali akkirizza okuwaayo "amaanyi ga UN yonna mu kulwanyisa obulwadde ".
translated: Ku lunaku lwe lumu, Tedros yategeezezza nti omuwandiisi w'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte, António Guterres yakkirizza okuwa "amaanyi g'enkola yonna ey'ekibiina ky'Amawanga Amagatte mu kuddamu".

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: Tiimu ya UN ekola ku kulwanyisa ebibamba (UN Crisis Management Team) yassibwawo, esobole okukwanaganya kaweefube w’Amawanga Amagatte gonna, nga kino WHO egamba nti kijja kubayamba "okussa essira ku byobujjanjabi ng’ebitongole ebirala bwe bireeta obukugu bwabyo okuyamba ku nsonga z’embeera z’abantu, ebyenfuna n’enkulaakulana mu kiseera ky’obulwadde buno ".
translated: Ttiimu y'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte evunaanyizibwa ku mbeera z'abantu yatandikibwawo olw'ekyavaamu, n'esobozesa okukwasaganya enkola yonna ey'ekibiina ky'Amawanga Amagatte ey'okuddamu, ekitongole ky'amawanga amagatte ky'egamba nti kijja kubakkiriza "okussa essira ku kuddamu kw'ebyobulamu ate ng'ebitongole ebirala bisobola okuleeta obukugu bwabyo okutwala ku nsonga z'embeera z'abantu, ez'ebyenfuna mu bugazi." n'ebiva mu nkulaakulana y'obulwadde buno".

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: Nga 14 Ogwokubiri, Tiimu ey’awamu eyakulirwa WHO mu China yassibwawo okuwaayo abakugu okuva mu nsi yonna ne mu WHO eri China okuyambako mu nkwata y’ebintu awaka n’okwekenneenya "obukambwe n’okusaasaana kw’obulwadde" nga bategeka emisomo n’enkuŋŋaana n’ebitongole ebikulu mu ggwanga n’okugenda mu bitundu okwekaliriza "ebiva mu bikoleddwa ku mutendera gw’ebitundu n’amasaza, omuli ebitundu eby’ebibuga n’eby’ebyalo". Nga 25 Ogwokubiri, WHO yalangirira nti "ensi erina okukola ekisingawo okwetegekera coronavirus ayinza okufuuka ekizibu ky’ensi yonna," n’egamba nti newankubadde obudde bwali bukyali okukiyita ekizibu ky’ensi yonna (pandemic), amawanga gaali gasaanye okubeera "nga geetegese ".
translated: Nga 14 February, Ttiimu y'emirimu ey'awamu eya WHO ne China yatandikibwawo okuwa abakugu mu nsi yonna n'aba WHO ku ttaka mu China okuyambako mu nzirukanya y'emirimu mu ggwanga n'okwekenneenya "obuzibu n'okusaasaana kw'obulwadde buno" nga bategeka emisomo n'enkiiko ne ebitongole ebikulu ku mutendera gw'eggwanga n'okukola okulambula mu nnimiro okwekenneenya "enkosa y'emirimu gy'okuddamu ku mutendera gw'amasaza n'amasaza, omuli n'ebibuga n'ebyalo".Nga 25 February, WHO yalangirira nti "ensi erina okukola ekisingawo okwetegekera ekisoboka coronavirus pandemic," n'ategeeza nti wadde nga kyali kikyali kikeerezi okugiyita ssennyiga omukambwe, wadde kiri kityo amawanga galina okuba "mu mutendera gw'okwetegekera".

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: Ku bulwadde obwali butandise okubalukawo mu Iran, WHO yaweerezaayo Tiimu ey’Awamu (Joint Mission Team) okwekenneenya embeera. Nga 28 Ogwokubiri, abakungu ba WHO baagamba nti okwekenneenya ekizibu kya coronavirus ku mutendera gw’ensi yonna kwali kwa kulinnyisibwa okuva ku kubeera "okw’amaanyi" okutuuka ku "okw’amaanyi ennyo", nga gwe mutendera gwabwe ogw’okwekenneenya ekizibu ogusinga okuba waggulu.
translated: Mu kwanukula ekirwadde ekikyakula mu Iran, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu ekya WHO kyasindikayo Joint Mission Team okwekenneenya embeera.Nga 28 February, abakungu ba WHO baategeeza nti okukebera obulabe bwa coronavirus ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna kwakulinnyisibwa okuva ku "waggulu" okudda ku "waggulu nnyo". , omutindo gwayo ogw’oku ntikko ogw’okwegendereza n’okukebera akabi.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: Mike Ryan, nga y’akulira enteekateeka ya WHO ey’ebigwawo mu byobulamu (WHO's health emergencies program), yalabula bwe yagamba nti "Kino kya kwekebera eri buli gavument mu nsi yonna: Muzuukuke.
translated: Mike Ryan, executive director wa WHO's health emergency program, yalabudde mu kiwandiiko nti "Kino kwekebejja ddala buli gavumenti ku nsi: Zuukuka."

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: Akawuka kano kayinza okuba nga kali mu kkubo kajja era mwetaaga okubeera abeetegefu," n’alabula nti okubeera n’enkola entuufu ez’okukalwanyisa kiyinza okuyamba ensi okwewala "ekisinga okuba ekyobulabe ".
translated: Akawuka kano kayinza okuba nga kali mu kkubo era olina okuba nga weetegese," ng'akubiriza nti enkola entuufu ey'okuddamu eyinza okuyamba ensi okwewala "ekisinga obubi".

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: Ryan era yagamba nti obubaka obuliwo mu kiseera kino bwali tebuleetera bakungu ba byabulamu kulangirira kizibu kino ng’eky’awamu mu nsi yonna, n’agamba nti ekirangiriro eky’engeri eno kyandibadde kitegeeza nti "tuba tukkirizza nti buli muntu mu nsi yonna ajja kukosebwa akawuka ako."
translated: Ryan yayongedde okutegeeza nti ebiwandiiko ebiriwo kati tebikkiriza bakungu ba bya bulamu kulangirira ssennyiga omukambwe mu nsi yonna, n'agamba nti okulangirira ng'okwo kwanditegeeza nti "mu bukulu tukkiriza nti buli muntu ku nsi ajja kukwatibwa akawuka ako."

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: Nga 11 Ogwokusatu, WHO yalangirira akawuka ka coronavirus ng’ekizibu eky’awamu mu nsi yonna.
translated: Nga 11 March, ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu ekya WHO kyalangirira nti ekirwadde kya coronavirus kyabaluseewo nga ssennyiga omukambwe.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: Director-General yagamba nti WHO yali "efaayo nnyo ku misinde emingi akawuka gye kaali katambulirako n’obukambwe bwako, n’engeri gye wataaliwo kya maanyi kikolebwa". WHO ekolokoteddwa nnyo olw’ekirabika ng’obutakola kya maanyi mu ngeri y’okukwatamu obulwadde, omuli n’okulwawo okulangirira ekizibu ky’ebyobulamu ekyetaaga okufiibwako amangu n’okubulangirira ng’ekizibu eky’ensi yonna.
translated: Dayirekita w'ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu yagambye nti ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu "kyeraliikirivu nnyo olw'emitendera egy'entiisa egy'okusaasaana n'obuzibu, n'emitendera egy'entiisa egy'obutakola".Ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu kifunye okunenya okw'amaanyi olw'ebyo ebitunuuliddwa ng'okukwata ekirwadde kya ssennyiga omukambwe mu ngeri emala, omuli n'... ekikeerezi okulangirira embeera ey’amangu ey’ebyobulamu n’okussa akawuka kano mu kibinja ky’ekirwadde kya ssennyiga omukambwe.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: Okukolokota kuno kwalimu okukaka Director-General wa WHO Tedros Adhanom okulekulira, nga kaweefube ono yassibwako emikono abantu 733,000 we lwatuukira nga 6 Ogwokuna.
translated: Mu kudda emabega kwabaddeko okusaba Dayirekita w’ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu mu by’obulamu, Tedros Adhanom okuwaayo ttenda y’okulekulira kwe, nga kuliko emikono gy’abantu 733,000 okutuuka nga 6 April.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: Nga 26 Ogwokusatu 2020, abakugu ba UN ku byeddembe ly’obuntu bakkaatiriza eky’okussa ekitiibwa mu ddembe lya buli muntu mu kiseera ky’obulwadde bwa COVID-19.
translated: Nga 26 March 2020, amakumi g’abakugu mu kibiina ky’amawanga amagatte ku ddembe ly’obuntu baaggumiza okussa ekitiibwa mu ddembe lya buli muntu ssekinnoomu mu kiseera kino ekirwadde kya COVID-19.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: Ekibinja ky’abakugu kyagamba nti buli muntu alina eddembe okufuna ebitaasa obulamu era nti buno buvunaanyizibwa bwa gavumenti.
translated: Ekibiina ky’abakugu kyategeezezza nti buli muntu alina okuyingira mu nsonga ezitaasa obulamu era gavumenti y’ekwata obuvunaanyizibwa buno.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: Ekibinja kino kyakkaatiriza nti ebbula ly’ebikozesebwa oba yinsuwa y’ebyobulamu tebirina kutwalibwa ng’ekyekwaso ky’okusosola abantu abamu.
translated: Ekibiina kino kyakkaatirizza nti obutaba na bikozesebwa oba yinsuwa y’ebyobulamu tekirina kukola ng’ensonga lwaki omuntu asosola ekibinja ekigere.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: Abakugu baakiraga nti buli muntu alina eddembe ku byobulamu, omuli n’abantu abalina obulemu, ebibinja by’abantu abatono, abakadde, abali mu nkambi z’ababudami, abatalina waabwe, ababeera mu mbeera embi ennyo, abasibe, awamu n’abanoonyi b’obubudamu n’abalala bonna abeetaaga obuyambi bwa gavumenti.
translated: Abakugu bano bakikkaatirizza nti buli muntu ssekinnoomu alina eddembe okufuna ebyobulamu, omuli abantu abaliko obulemu, abali mu bibinja ebitono, abakadde, ababundabunda munda mu ggwanga, abatalina mwasirizi, abo ababeera mu mbeera embi ennyo, abantu abali mu kkomera, wamu n’ababundabunda n’ebirala ebitannaba kutegeerekeka ebibinja ebyetaaga obuwagizi bwa gavumenti.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: Ebitongole bya gavumenti mu nsi yonna bikola ku buzibu bwa COVID-19 eri ebyenfuna n’embeera z’abantu.
translated: Ebibiina bya gavumenti ez’ensi yonna bikola ku nsonga ezikoseddwa mu by’enfuna n’embeera z’abantu olw’obuzibu bwa COVID-19.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: Ekitongole ki Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development kitaddewo enkola mwe kinaayita okuwa obubaka mu budde era mu bujjuvu ku nkola eziteereddwawo mu mawanga okwetooloola ensi, awamu n’ebirowoozo n’amagezi.
translated: Ekibiina ekivunaanyizibwa ku nkolagana n’enkulaakulana mu by’enfuna kitongozza omukutu gw’okuwa amawulire mu budde era mu bujjuvu ku nkola y’okuddamu mu mawanga okwetoloola ensi yonna, wamu n’endowooza n’okubuulirira.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: Okuva ku nkola z’okunyweza ebyobujjanjabi n’ebyenfuna by’ensi yonna okutuuka ku kukola ku bireetebwawo omuggalo n’okuggala ebyentambula, enkola enko erimu Akalondoola Enkola mu Mawanga (Country Policy Tracker), era egenderera okuyamba amawanga okuyigira ku gannaago era n’okukwaganya kaweefube w’omu nsi yonna mu kusoomoozebwa kwa coronavirus.
translated: Okuva ku nkola z’okunyweza enkola z’ebyobulamu n’ebyenfuna by’ensi yonna okutuuka ku kukola ku bikolwa by’omuggalo n’okuziyiza entambula, ekifo kino ekya digito kirimu ekyuma ekilondoola enkola y’amawanga, era kigenderera okuyamba amawanga okuyigira ku bannaabwe n’okuyamba ensi yonna okukwatagana mu ngeri ey’okuddamu... okusoomoozebwa kwa coronavirus.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: Gavumenti ya China ekolokoteddwa United States, Minisita wa UK owa Kabineeti Michael Gove, ne mutabani wa Pulezidenti wa Brazil Jair Bolsonaro nga ye Eduardo Bolsonaro olw’engeri gye baakuttemu ekizibu kino, ekyatandikira mu Province y’e China ey’e Hubei.
translated: Gavumenti ya China ezze evumirira Amerika, Minisita wa Bungereza avunaanyizibwa ku ofiisi ya kabineti Michael Gove, ne mutabani wa Pulezidenti wa Brazil Jair Bolsonaro Eduardo Bolsonaro olw’engeri gye yakwatamu ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe, ekyatandikira mu ssaza ly’e Hubei mu China.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: Abakulembeze bangi ku mutendera gwa Province mu kibiina kya Communist Party of China (CPC) baagobwa olw’engeri gye bakwatamu kaweefube wa kalantiini mu Masekkati ga China, akabonero akalaga obutali bumativu ku ngeri abakulembeze gye bakwatamu obulwadde mu bitundu ebyo.
translated: Abaddukanya ekibiina kya Communist Party of China (CPC) abawerako ku mutendera gw’amasaza bagobeddwa olw’engeri gye bakwatamu kaweefube wa kalantiini mu masekkati ga China, akabonero akalaga obutali bumativu n’engeri ekitongole ky’ebyobufuzi gye kyazzeemu obulwadde buno mu bitundu ebyo.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Abatunuulizi abamu balowooza nti ekikolwa kino kyagendererwamu okutaasa Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kya Chinese Communist Party Xi Jinping ku busungu bw’abantu olw’ekirwadde kya coronavirus ekyali kibaluseewo.
translated: Abamu ku bannyonyola balowooza nti kino kyabadde kigendereddwamu kukuuma ssaabawandiisi wa China Communist Party Xi Jinping obutasunguwalira abantu olw’ekirwadde kya coronavirus.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: Abakungu ba China abamu, okugeza Zhao Lijian baawakanya ekyali kisoose okukkirizibwa nti akawuka ka coronavirus kaatandikira mu Wuhan, nga bawagira endowooza z’okwekobaana ezaali ziraga nti COVID-19 yatandikira mu U.S. oba Italy.
translated: Abamu ku bakungu ba China, okugeza Zhao Lijian yagaana okukkiriza okwasooka ku kirwadde kya coronavirus okutandika mu Wuhan, nga bawagira endowooza z’olukwe ezikwata ku COVID-19 ezisibuka mu Amerika oba Italy.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: Obukulembeze bwa Donald Trump mu Amerika bwogera ku coronavirus nga "Akawuka k’e China " oba "Akawuka k’e Wuhan " nga bagamba nti "okuwangulwa kwa China kwabaleetera okukola akawuka kati akafuuse ekizibu ky’ensi yonna ", nga kino nakyo kikolokoteddwa abantu abamu ng’okusosola mu langi "nga kivudde ku kulemererwa kw’obukulembeze bwe okulwanyisa obulwadde " buno.
translated: Gavumenti ya Amerika eya Donald Trump eyogedde ku kawuka ka coronavirus nti "Chinese virus" oba "Wuhan virus" ng'egamba nti "okusengejja kwa China kwa supercharged akawuka kati akafuuse ssennyiga omukambwe mu nsi yonna", nga kino nakyo abamu ku bavumirira bakivumirira nti kisosola mu mawanga ne "okuwugula [okuwugula] okuva ku administration ye okulemererwa okuziyiza obulwadde buno".

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: Daily Beast yafuna obubaka okuva mu gavumenti ya Amerika nga bulaga akakodyo k’empuliziganya okuva mu National Security Council, ng’akakodyo kalaga nti "Buli kimu kikwata ku China.
translated: The Daily Beast yafunye cable ya gavumenti ya Amerika ng’eraga akakodyo k’empuliziganya akalabika ng’ensibuko y’olukiiko lw’ebyokwerinda mu ggwanga, ng’enkola eno ejuliziddwa nti “Buli kimu kikwata ku China.”

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: Tutegeezebwa okugezaako okufulumya amawulire gano mu ngeri yonna esoboka, omuli enkuŋŋaana z’amawulire n’okulabikira ku ttivvi." Emikutu nga Politico, Foreign Policy, ne Bloomberg gyagamba nti kaweefube wa China ku kuweeeza obuyambi eri amawanga agakoseddwa akawuka kye kimu ku ppokoppoko waabwe ow’okufuna obuganzi mu nsi yonna.
translated: Tugambibwa okugezaako okufulumya obubaka buno mu ngeri yonna esoboka, omuli enkiiko za bannamawulire n'okulabika ku ttivvi."Emikutu nga Politico, Foreign Policy, ne Bloomberg gitegeezezza nti kaweefube wa China okuweereza obuyambi mu mawanga agalina akawuka y'emu wa pulopaganda okusindiikiriza okufuga ensi yonna.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: Akulira ensonga z’amawanga amalala mu EU (foreign policy chief) Josep Borrell yalabula nti mulimu "ebyobufuzi by’amawanga omuli n’okulwanira obwannampala ne 'ebyobufuzi bya mwoyo gwa ggwanga'".
translated: Akulira enkola y'ensonga z'ebweru mu mukago gwa EU, Josep Borrell yalabudde nti waliwo "ekitundu ky'ebyobufuzi omuli okulwanagana n'obuyinza nga bayita mu kuwuuta n'ebyobufuzi by'obugabi'".

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: Borrell era yagamba nti "China erwana okuyisaawo obulaga nti, obutafaanana na Amerika, bo balina obuvunaanyizibwa era beesigika."
translated: Borrell era agambye nti "China esika nnyo obubaka nti, obutafaananako Amerika, ye mukwano ogw'obuvunaanyizibwa era eyeesigika."

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: China era yasaba Amerika okuggya envumbo ku Syria, Venezuela ne Iran, ng’eno bw’egenda mu maaso n’okuweereza amawanga ago obuyambi.
translated: China era esabye Amerika eggyewo envumbo zaayo ku Syria, Venezuela ne Iran, ate nga kigambibwa nti eweereza obuyambi mu mawanga gombi agasembyeyo.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: Obuyambi bwa Jack Ma obw’obukookolo 100,000 eri Cuba bwakwatibwa olw’envumbo za Amerika nga 3 Ogwokuna.
translated: Jack Ma okuwaayo masiki 100,000 eri Cuba yaziyizibwa envumbo za Amerika nga 3 April.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: Aboobuyinza mu Amerika nabo baanenyezebwa olw’okuwamba obuyambi obwali buweerezebwa mu mawanga amalala ne babwekomya.
translated: Ab’obuyinza mu Amerika nabo babadde balumiriza okukyusa obuyambi obugendereddwamu amawanga amalala ne babutwala mu nsi yaabwe.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: Era wabaddewo obutakkaanya obukwata ku bukookolo wakati w’amawanga amalala, nga Germany, Austria ne Switzerland; ne Czech Republic ne Italy.
translated: Era wabaddewo enkaayana ezikwata ku masiki ezitegeezeddwa wakati w’amawanga amalala, nga Germany, Austria ne Switzerland; ne Czech Republic ne Yitale.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: Ekirala, Turkey yabowa ebikumi n’ebikumi by’ebyuma ebiyamba mu kussa (ventilators) ebyali bigenda e Spain.
translated: Ng’oggyeeko ekyo, Turkey yakwata ebikumi n’ebikumi by’ebyuma ebiyamba okussa nga bigenda e Spain.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: Ku ntandikwa y’Ogwokusatu, gavumenti ya Italy yakolokota Omukago gwa Bulaaya olw’obutayimirira wamu ne Italy ng’ekoseddwa coronavirus.
translated: Ku ntandikwa ya March, gavumenti ya Yitale yavumirira omukago gwa Bulaaya obutakwatagana na Yitale eyakoseddwa ekirwadde kya corona.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: Maurizio Massari, omukiise wa Italy mu EU, yagamba nti "China yokka ye yabafaako.
translated: Maurizio Massari, omubaka wa Yitale mu mukago gwa EU yagambye nti "China yokka ye yazzeemu enjuyi zombi."

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: Mu buli ngeri, kano si kabonero kalungi ak’omukago gwa Bulaaya."
translated: Mazima ddala, kano si kabonero kalungi akalaga nti Bulaaya yeegatta."

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Nga 22 Ogwokusatu, oluvannyuma lw’okwogera ku ssimu ne Ssaabaminisita wa Italy Giuseppe Conte, Pulezidenti wa Russia Vladimir Putin yateekateeka amagye ga Russia okuweereza abasawo b’amagye, ebimotoka ebifuuyira eddagala, n’ebikozesebwa ebirala mu kujjanjaba mu Italy.
translated: Nga 22 March, oluvannyuma lw’okukuba essimu ne Ssaabaminisita wa Yitale, Giuseppe Conte, pulezidenti wa Russia Vladimir Putin yategeka amagye ga Russia okusindika abasawo b’amagye, mmotoka ez’enjawulo ezitta obuwuka, n’ebyuma ebirala eby’obujjanjabi e Yitale.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: Olupapula (lw’amawulire) lwa Italy olwa La Stampa nga lwesigama ku "munnabyabufuzi owa waggulu ennyo" ataayatuukirizibwa lwagamba nti ebitundu 80 ku kikumi eby’obuyambi bwa Russia "tebwalina mugaso oba bwalina omugaso mutono nnyo eri Italy ".
translated: Olupapula lw'amawulire olwa La Stampa olwa Italy lwawaddeyo "ensonda y'ebyobufuzi ey'omutindo ogwa waggulu" etaategeerekese mannya nti obuyambi bwa Russia ebitundu 80 ku 100 "tebulina mugaso oba tebulina mugaso munene eri Yitale".

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: Munnabyabufuzi ono yalangira Russia okuzannya "ebyobufuzi" bya kabampaane.
translated: Ensonda eno yalumirizza Russia okutandika okulumba "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: Pulezidenti wa Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, ne Minisita wa Italy ow’Ensonga z’Ebweru Luigi Di Maio baasambajja ebyafulumira mu mawulire ago era ne balaga okusiima kwabwe.
translated: Pulezidenti wa Lombardy, Attilio Fontana ne Minisita wa Yitale ow’ensonga z’ebweru Luigi Di Maio baagobye amawulire gano ne balaga okwebaza kwabwe.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: Russia era yaweereza ennyonyi y’emigugu ng’erimu obuyambi bw’eddagala eri Amerika.
translated: Russia era yasindika ennyonyi etwala emigugu ng’erina obuyambi bw’abasawo mu Amerika.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: Omwogezi wa Kremlin Dmitry Peskov yagamba nti "mu kuwaayo obuyambi eri Amerika, [Putin] asuubira nti abakozi b’eddagala mu Amerika bwe banaatereera ebintu ne bidda mu nteeko, nabo bajja kuba basobola okumusasula bwe kinaaba kyetaagisizza."
translated: Omwogezi wa Kremlin, Dmitry Peskov yagambye nti "bw'aba awaayo obuyambi eri banne mu Amerika, [Putin] akitwala nti abakola ebyuma n'ebikozesebwa mu by'obujjanjabi mu Amerika bwe banaafuna amaanyi, nabo bajja kusobola okuddamu bwe kiba kyetaagisa."

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: Enteekateeka ya NATO eya "Defender 2020" mu Germany, Poland, n’amawanga ga Baltic, ng’eno y’enteekateeka y’amagye eya NATO esinga obunene okuva Cold War bwe yakomekkerezebwa, ejja kubaawo ng’ekendeezeddwa ku mudigido.
translated: Dduyiro w'amagye ga NATO "Defender 2020" ategekeddwa mu Girimaani, Poland, n'amawanga ga Baltic, dduyiro w'olutalo asinga obunene mu NATO bukya Ssematalo ow'enzikiza awedde, agenda kubeera ku mutendera ogukendeezeddwa.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: Omuwandiisi wa Kakuyege w’Okuggyako Ebyokulwanyisa Namuzisa (Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament) Kate Hudson yakolokota enteekateeka ya Defender 2020: "Mu kizibu ky’ebyobulamu ekiriwo kati, kissa mu katyabaga obulamu bwa bannamagye ga Amerika n’amawanga ga Bulaaya mangi awamu ne bannansi b’omu mawanga gye bakolera." Gavument ya Iran ekoseddwa nnyo akawuka, nga bammemba ba paalamenti abasoba mu makumi abiri bakwatiddwa akawuka awamu ne bannabyabufuzi abalala kkumi na bataano.
translated: Omuwandiisi omukulu owa Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament, Kate Hudson yanenyezza dduyiro wa Defender 2020: "Mu buzibu bw'ebyobulamu bw'abantu obuliwo kati, buteeka mu matigga obulamu bw'amagye gokka agava mu Amerika n'amawanga ga Bulaaya amangi ageetabye mu nteekateeka eno wabula n'abatuuze b'amawanga mwe muli." they are operating."Gavumenti ya Iran ekoseddwa nnyo akawuka kano, nga bammemba ba palamenti abawera amakumi abiri bakwatibwa wamu n'abalala kkumi na bataano ab'ebyobufuzi abaliwo oba abaaliwo.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: Pulezidenti wa Iran Hassan Rouhani yawandiika ebbaluwa ey’awamu eri abakulembeze mu nsi yonna ng’asaba obuyambi nga 14 Ogwokusatu 2020, ng’agamba nti eggwanga lye likaluubirizibwa okulwanyisa obulwadde olw’okusalwa ku butale bw’ensi yonna olw’envumbo Amerika ze yassa ku Iran. Okubalukawo kw’obulwadde buno kwongedde ku kulaajanira Amerika okugoberera enkola za nnaakalyakaani (social policies) ezisangibwa ennyo mu mawanga amalala amagagga, omuli obujjanjabi obwa bonna, okulabirira abaana bonna, empummula ensasulire, n’okussa ennyo ssente mu byobujjabi bw’abantu bonna.
translated: Pulezidenti wa Iran Hassan Rouhani yawandiikira abakulembeze b’ensi yonna ebbaluwa mu lujjudde ng’asaba obuyambi nga 14 March 2020, n’agamba nti eggwanga lye liri mu kattu okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino olw’obutatuuka ku butale bw’ensi yonna nga kivudde ku nvumbo za Amerika ku Iran.Ekirwadde kino kivuddeko okusaba Amerika okussaawo enkola z’embeera z’abantu ezitera okubeera mu mawanga amalala agagagga, omuli okulabirira abaana bonna, okulabirira abaana bonna, oluwummula lw’amaka olusasulwa, n’ensimbi ezisingako ez’okudduukirira ebyobulamu by’abantu bonna.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: Abatunuulizi b’ebyobufuzi baateebereza nti kiyinza okukosa emikisa gya Donald Trump okuddamu okulondebwa mu kulonda kwa pulezidenti okwa 2020. Enkolagana wakati wa Japan ne South Korea yasajjuka olw’ekirwadde kino.
translated: Abakugu mu byobufuzi baali basuubira nti kiyinza okukosa obubi emikisa gya Donald Trump okuddamu okulondebwa mu kulonda kwa Pulezidenti okwa 2020. Enkolagana wakati wa Japan ne South Korea yeeyongedde okwonooneka olw’ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: South Korea yakolokota enkola za Japani eza "kalantiini ezibuzaabuza n’obutabaamu mulamwa" oluvannyuma lwa Japan okulangirira nti buli muntu ava e South Korea ajja kussibwa mu kalantiini mu bifo ebiteereddwawo gavumenti okumala wiiki bbiri.
translated: South Korea yavumiridde Japan "kaweefube wa kalantiini ow'obutategeeragana era obutakola" oluvannyuma lwa Japan okulangirira nti omuntu yenna ava e South Korea agenda kuteekebwa mu kalantiini ya wiiki bbiri mu bifo gavumenti bye yalonda.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Abantu b’e South Korea mu kusooka baali beeyawuddemu olw’engeri Pulezidenti Moon Jae-in gye yakwatamu ensonga z’ekirwadde.
translated: Ekibiina kya South Korea kyasooka kuwukana ku ngeri Pulezidenti Moon Jae-in gye yakwatamu obuzibu buno.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: Abakoleya bangi bassa emikono ku kiwandiiko ekisaba okugobwa kwa Moon olwa kye baayita gavumenti okukwata obubi ensonga y’ekirwadde ekibaluseewo, ate abamu nga bawagira enkola ye. Ekizibu kino kireetedde amawanga okuyisa amateeka ag’amangu okusobola okukirwanyisa.
translated: Bannakorea bangi baassa omukono ku mpaaba oba nga basaba Moon agobwe mu ntebe olw’ebyo bye bagamba nti gavumenti okukwata obubi ekirwadde kino, oba okutendereza engeri gye yazzeemu.Ssenyiga omukambwe kisobozesezza amawanga okuyisa etteeka ery’amangu mu kwanukula.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: Abatunuulizi abamu balaze okutya nti kiino kiyinza okusobozesa gavumenti okunywereza mu buyinza.
translated: Abamu ku bakubaganya ebirowoozo balaze obweraliikirivu nti kiyinza okusobozesa gavumenti okunyweza enkwata yazo ku buyinza.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: Mu Hungary, paalamenti yaayo yalonda ng’ekkiriza ssaabaminisita, Viktor Orbán, okufugira mu kirangiriro awatali bbanga ggere, ne bayimiriza paalamenti awamu n’okulonda n’okubonereza abo abatwalibwa okuba nga basaasaanya amawulire ag’obulimba ku kawuka n’engeri gavumenti gy’ekuttemu ekizibu kino.
translated: Mu Hungary, palamenti yaayo yakuba akalulu n’ekkiriza ssaabaminisita, Viktor Orbán, okufuga n’ekiragiro ekiseera ekitali kigere, okuyimiriza palamenti kw’ossa n’okulonda n’okubonereza abo abalowoozebwa okuba nga basaasaanyizza amawulire ag’obulimba ku kawuka kano n’engeri gavumenti gy’ekwatamu obuzibu buno.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: Okubalukawo kwa coronavirus kuweereddwa ng’eky’okwekwasa olw’ebintu bingi ebikendedde, nga kiva ku bintu ebyongedde okukozesebwa ennyo okwetooloola ensi mu kulwanyisa obulwadde gye bugenze bubalukawo, okugula ebintu ebingi omulundi ogumu, n’okutaataaganyizibwa mu nkola y’amakolero n’emirimu emirala.
translated: Ekirwadde kya coronavirus kibadde kivunaanibwa emirundi egiwerako olw’ebbula ly’ebintu, nga kiva ku kukozesa ebyuma mu nsi yonna okweyongera okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino, okugula ebintu mu bunkenke, n’okutaataaganyizibwa mu mirimu gy’amakolero n’okutambuza ebintu.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: Ekitongole kya America ekikola ku by’emmere n’eddagala (United States Food and Drug Administration) kyayisa okulabula ku bbula ly’eddagala n’ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba olw’obwetaavu bwabyo okweyongera n’okutaataaganyizibwa mu nfulumya yaabyo.
translated: Ekitongole kya Amerika ekivunaanyizibwa ku by’emmere n’eddagala kifulumizza okulabula ku bbula ly’eddagala n’ebikozesebwa mu by’obujjanjabi olw’obwetaavu bw’abaguzi obweyongedde n’okutaataaganyizibwa kw’abaguzi.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: Ebitundu bingi era byalimu okugula ebintu ebingi omulundi ogumu ekyaviirako amaduuka okuggwaamu ebintu eby’omugaso ng’emmere, ebikookooma, n’amazzi g’okunywa, so nga ne gye bisuubulwa bikendedde.
translated: Ebitundu ebiwerako era byalabye okugula ebintu mu ngeri ey’okutya ekyaviirako obusawo okugogolwa ebintu ebikulu eby’emmere ng’emmere, kaabuyonjo, n’amazzi g’omu bidomola, ekyavaako ebbula ly’ebikozesebwa.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: Okusingira ddala abakola ebyuma bikalimagezi baalabula nti wajja kubaawo okukeerewa mu kutambuza ebyuma bino.
translated: Abakola tekinologiya naddala babadde balabula ku kulwawo okusindika ebintu eby’amasannyalaze.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: Okusinziira ku mukulu wa WHO Tedros Adhanom, obwetaavu bw’ebintu eby’okwekuuma bulinnye emirundi 100.
translated: Okusinziira ku dayirekita w’ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu eky’ensi yonna, Tedros Adhanom, obwetaavu bw’ebikozesebwa mu kwekuuma bweyongedde emirundi 100.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Obwetaavu buno buleeseewo okweyongera mu miwendo egyekubisizzaamu emirundi egiwera amakumi abiri n’okuleetera ebintu ebikozesebwa mu byobulamu okukeerewa okutuuka emyezi egiwera ena okutuuka ku mukaaga.
translated: Okwetaaga kuno kuleetedde ebbeeyi okulinnya okutuuka ku bbeeyi eya bulijjo emirundi amakumi abiri era n’okulwawo ku kugaba ebintu eby’obujjanjabi okumala emyezi ena ku mukaaga.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: Era kireeseewo ebbula ly’ebintu ebikuuma abantu mu nsi yonna, nga WHO erabula nti kino kijja kussa obulamu bw’abasawo mu katyabaga.
translated: Era kireeseewo ebbula ly’ebikozesebwa mu kwekuuma mu nsi yonna, ng’ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu kirabudde nti kino kijja kuteeka abakozi b’ebyobulamu mu matigga.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Mu Australia, ekizibu ky’ekirwadde kino kyawa omukisa abasuubuzi ba daigou okutunda ebyamaguzi by’e Australian mu China.
translated: Mu Australia, ssenyiga ono yawa omukisa omupya eri abaguzi ba daigou okutunda ebintu bya Australia mu China.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Ekikolwa kino kyaleetawo ebbula ly’emmere y’abaana abawere mu ssemaduuka ezimu era oluvannyuma ne kiwerebwa mu gavumenti ya Australia. Newankubadde waliwo abalwadde ba COVID-19 bangi mu Bukiikakkono bwa Italy ne mu kitundu ky’e Wuhan, nga noolwekyo waliyo obwetaavu bw’emmere bungi, ebitundu bino byombi tebibaddeemu bbula lya mmere liyitiridde.
translated: Omulimu guno guleetedde ebbula ly’emmere y’abaana mu supamaketi ezimu era oluvannyuma gavumenti ya Australia n’ewera.Wadde ng’abalwadde ba COVID-19 basusse mu bukiikakkono bwa Italy ne mu bitundu by’e Wuhan, n’obwetaavu bw’emmere obwaddirira, ebitundu byombi bifunye awonye ebbula ly’emmere ery’amaanyi.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: Amakubo China ne Italy ge baayitamu okulwanyisa okugula ebintu ebingi n’obusuubuzi obutali mu mateeka gakoze, ne basobola okwewala ebbula ly’emmere eriyitiridde eryasuubirwa mu Bulaaya ne mu Bukiikakkono bwa America.
translated: Enkola za China ne Yitale okulwanyisa okukung’aanya n’okusuubula ebintu ebikulu mu ngeri emenya amateeka zibadde nnungi, okwewala ebbula ly’emmere ery’amaanyi eryali lisuubirwa mu Bulaaya nga kw’otadde ne mu North America.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: Mu bukiikakkono bwa Italy ewali obulimi obungi tewabaddeeyo bbula lya mmere lya maanyi, wabula emiwendo biyinza okulinnya okusinziira ku bakiikirira amakolero.
translated: Obukiikakkono bwa Yitale ng’obulimi bungi tebunnakendeera nnyo, kyokka emiwendo giyinza okweyongera okusinziira ku bakiise b’amakolero.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: Amasa g’emmere ameereere gaalabwako ekiseera kitono, wadde ne mu kibuga Wuhan, ng’eno abakungu ba gavumenti ya China baggula amaterekero g’ennyama y’embizzi okukakasa ng’abantu balya ekimala.
translated: Ebisenge by’emmere ekyerere byasangiddwawo okumala akaseera katono, ne mu kibuga Wuhan, ate abakungu ba gavumenti ya China ne bafulumya ennyama y’embizzi okukakasa nti abantu bafuna emmere emala.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: Amateeka geegamu gali ne mu Italy ng’abakozi b’emmere kibeetaagisa okukuuma emmere olw’ebibamba nga bino.
translated: Amateeka agafaananako bwe gatyo galiwo ne mu Yitale nga galagira abakola emmere okutereka ssente eziterekeddwa mu mbeera ez’amangu ng’ezo.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: Okukosebwa okutuuse ku byenfuna by’ensi yonna China ekuwuliddemu: okusinziira ku alipoota eyafulumira mu mawulire nga 16 Ogwokusatu, ebyenfuna mu China byakosebwa nnyo mu myezi ebiri egyasooka mu 2020 olw’enkola ezassibwawo gavumenti okulemesa akawuka okusaasaana, era ebitundibwa eri abantu byakendeera ebitundu 20.5%.
translated: Okwonoonebwa kw’ebyenfuna by’ensi yonna kuwuliddwa mu China: okusinziira ku lipoota y’emikutu gy’amawulire nga 16 March, ebyenfuna mu China byakosebwa nnyo mu myezi ebiri egyasooka mu mwaka gwa 2020 olw’ebintu gavumenti bye yakola okukendeeza ku kusaasaana kw’akawuka, n’okutunda okutunda kwakendedde ebitundu 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: Olw’okuba nga China erina ebyenfuna bya maanyi era efulumya ebintu bingi, okubalukawo kw’akawuka kutaataaganyizza nnyo ebyenfuna by’ensi yonna.
translated: Olw’okuba China ku lukalu lwe lukulu mu by’enfuna n’amakolero, ekirwadde ky’akawuka kano kirabiddwa ng’ekiyinza okutabangula ebyenfuna by’ensi yonna.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Agathe Demarais owa Economist Intelligence Unit yateebereza nti obutale bujja kusigala nga tebutegeerekeka bulungi okutuusa ng’ekifaananyi ekitegeerekeka ku kiyinza okuddirira kirabise.
translated: Agathe Demarais ow’ekitongole ekikessi ekya Economist Intelligence Unit ategeezezza nti obutale bugenda kusigala nga bukyukakyuka okutuusa ng’ekifaananyi ekitegeerekeka kivuddeyo ku biyinza okuvaamu.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: Mu Janwali 2020, abeekenneenya abamu baateebereza nti obulwadde kye bunaatuusa ku byenfuna ku nkulaakulana y’ensi yonna kiyinza okusinga ku ekyo ekyaliwo olw’obulwadde bwa SARS mu 2002–2004 SARS.
translated: Mu January 2020, abamu ku basenserezi baateebereza nti eby’enfuna ebyava mu ssennyiga ono ku nkulaakulana y’ensi yonna biyinza okusukka ebyava mu kirwadde kya SARS ekyabalukawo mu 2002–2004.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: Okuteebereza kw’omukugu omu mu Washington University mu St. Louis kwalaga ekkonde lya buwumbi bwa doola 300 n’okusingawo ku bintu ebikolebwa mu nsi yonna nga kino kiyinza okubeerawo okumala emyaka egiwera ebiri.
translated: Okubalirira okumu okuva ew’omukugu mu Washington University e St. Louis kwawa obuwumbi bwa ddoola 300+ okukwata ku nkola y’okugabira abantu ebintu mu nsi yonna okuyinza okumala emyaka ebiri.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: Ekibiina ky’Amawanga Agatunda Amafuta (Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC)) kigambibwa nti “kyagwa” oluvannyuma lw’ebbeeyi y’amafuta okukendeera ennyo olw’okukendeera kw’obwetaavu bwago mu China.
translated: Kigambibwa nti ekibiina ekigatta amawanga agasuubula amafuta ebweru w’eggwanga ekya OPEC “kyatabuse” oluvannyuma lw’ebbeeyi y’amafuta okukka ennyo olw’obwetaavu okuva mu China okukka.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: Obutale bw’emigabo mu nsi yonna bwagwa nga 24 Ogwokubiri olw’okweyongera ennyo mu muwendo gw’abalwadde ba COVID-19 wabweru wa China.
translated: Obutale bw’emigabo mu nsi yonna bwagwa nga 24 February olw’omuwendo gw’abalwadde ba COVID-19 okweyongera ennyo ebweru wa China ku lukalu.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: Nga 27 Ogwokubiri, olw’okweyongera okweraliikiriza ekirwadde kya coronavirus, ebibalo by’enkola y’emigabo (stock indexes) bingi mu U.S. omuli NASDAQ-100, S&P 500 Index, ne Dow Jones Industrial Average byalaga okukka kw’emiwendo okukyasinze okuva mu 2008, nga Dow yakka obutundutundu 1,191, nga kuno kwe kukka okwali kukyasinze okuba okunene okuva ku katyabaga k’ebyenfuna aka 2007–08.
translated: Nga 27 February, olw’okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kirwadde kya coronavirus, emiwendo gy’emigabo egy’enjawulo mu Amerika okuli NASDAQ-100, S&P 500 Index, ne Dow Jones Industrial Average gyakendedde nnyo okuva mu 2008, nga Dow yagwa obubonero 1,191, nga bwe businga obunene okukendeera kw’olunaku lumu okuva mu buzibu bw’ebyensimbi mu 2007–08.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: Ebibalo byonsatule byamalako wiiki nga biri wansi ebitundu 10%.
translated: Emiwendo gyonna esatu gyakomekkerezza wiiki nga gikka ebitundu ebisoba mu 10%.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: Nga 28 Ogwokubiri, Scope Ratings GmbH baakakasa nti China yali ekyetengeredde mu byenfuna (sovereign credit rating), wabula baalaga nti kino kyali kisobola okukyuka (Negative Outlook).
translated: Nga 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH yakakasa nti China egaba ebbanja lya gavumenti, kyokka n’ekuuma Negative Outlook.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: Emigabo gyaddamu ne gikka olw’okutya coronavirus, ng’okukka okungi kwaliwo nga 16 Ogwokusatu.
translated: Emigabo gyazzeemu okugwa nga basinziira ku kutya kwa coronavirus, okugwa okusinga nga 16 March.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: Bangi balowooza nti wajja kubaawo okugwa mu byenfuna (economic recession).
translated: Bangi batwala okusereba kw’ebyenfuna ng’okuyinza okubaawo.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: Munnabyanfuna Mohamed El-Erian yatendereza enkola za banka eza wakati n’amasaza.
translated: Omukugu mu by’enfuna Mohamed El-Erian yasiimye enkola za bbanka enkulu n’amawanga ez’amangu mu budde.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: Banka za wakati zaasitukiddemu mangu okusinga bwe zaakola mu kudobonkana kw’ebyenfuna okwa 2008.
translated: Bbanka enkulu zikola mangu okusinga bwe zakola ku kugwa kw’ebyensimbi mu 2008.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: Ebyobulambuzi kye kimu ku bitongole ebisinze okukosebwa olw’okuyimiriza entambula, okuggala ebifo by’olukale omuli n’ebyo ebyettanirwa abatambuze, n’okuwabula kwa gavumenti okwewala okutambula okw’engeri yonna okwetooloola ensi yonna.
translated: Eby’obulambuzi kye kimu ku bisinga okukosebwa olw’okuwera entambula, okuggala ebifo eby’olukale omuli n’ebifo eby’entambula, n’okuwabula gavumenti ku kutambula kwonna mu nsi yonna.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: Ekyava mu kino, ennyonyi ezisinga zaasazaamu entambula zaazo olw’obutettanirwa bulungi, omuli British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, ne Qantas, so nga kampuni y’ennyonyi y’e Bungereza eya Flybe yo yagwa.
translated: N’ekyavaamu, kkampuni z’ennyonyi nnyingi zisazizzaamu ennyonyi olw’obwetaavu obutono, omuli British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, ne Qantas, ate kkampuni y’ennyonyi eya Bungereza eya Flybe ey’omu kitundu n’egwa.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: Ekyatuusibwa ku kampuni z’amaato agalambuza abantu kyo kyali tekirabwangako emabega.
translated: Enkosa ku mulimu gwa cruise line yali ku mutendera ogutalabwangako.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: Sitashoni z’eggaali z’omukka nnyingi n’emyalo gy’ebidyeri nagyo gyaggalwa.
translated: Ebifo by’eggaali y’omukka n’emyalo gy’ebidyeri ebiwerako nabyo biggale.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: Obulwadde buno bwajjira mu kiseera kyekimu ne Chunyun, ekiseera ky’okutambula ennyo mu kwetegekera oluwummula lw’Omwaka gwa China Omupya.
translated: Ssenyiga ono yakwatagana ne Chunyun, sizoni y’entambula enkulu ekwatagana n’ennaku enkulu z’Abachina ez’omwaka omuggya.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: Emikolo mingi egibaamu abantu abangi gyasazibwamu gavumenti ya wakati n’ez’ebitundu, nga mwemuli n’ebikujjuko by’Omwaka Omupya, nga n’amakampuni ag’obwannannyini gaggalawo awamu n’ebifo by’abalambuzi nga Hong Kong Disneyland ne Shanghai Disneyland.
translated: Emikolo egiwerako egyabaddemu abantu abangi gyasazibwamu gavumenti z’eggwanga n’ebitundu omuli ebikujjuko by’omwaka omuggya ebitegekebwa buli mwaka, nga kkampuni z’obwannannyini nazo zeetongodde ziggalawo amaduuka gaabwe n’ebifo eby’obulambuzi nga Hong Kong Disneyland ne Shanghai Disneyland.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: Emikolo gy’Omwaka Omupya mingi n’ebifo by’abalambuzi byaggalwa okwewala okukuŋŋaanya abantu abangi, omuli Forbidden City mu Beijing n’emyoleso gy’omu masinzizo amakadde.
translated: Emikolo mingi egy’omwaka omuggya ogw’omwezi n’ebifo eby’obulambuzi biggaddwa okutangira okukuŋŋaana kw’abantu abangi omuli ekibuga ekigaaniddwa mu kibuga Beijing n’emyoleso gy’amasinzizo ag’ennono.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: Mu province za China 24 ku ezo 31, zi munisipaali, n’ebitundu, abakulembeze baayongezaayo oluwummula lw’Omwaka Omupya okutuuka nga 10 Ogwokubiri, ne balagira emirimu egisinga obutaggulawo okutuusa olunaku olwo.
translated: Mu masaza, munisipaali n’ebitundu 24 ku 31 mu China, ab’obuyinza bongeddeyo oluwummula lw’omwaka omuggya okutuuka nga 10 February, ne balagira ebifo ebisinga eby’okukoleramu obutaddamu kuggulawo okutuusa ku lunaku olwo.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: Ebitundu bino bikola ebitundu 80% eby’enfuna y’eggwanga (GDP) n’ebitundu 90% eby’ebintu ebitundibwa ebweru w’eggwanga.
translated: Ebitundu bino byali bikiikirira ebitundu 80% ku GDP y’eggwanga ate 90% ku by’amaguzi ebifulumizibwa ebweru w’eggwanga.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: Hong Kong yalinnyisa ku mutendera gwayo ogw’okulwanyisa endwadde ezisiigibwa n’egutuusa ku ogwo ogusinga okubeera waggulu (highest level) era n’erangirira akaseera aka kazigizigi, n’eggala amasomero okutuusa mu Gwokusatu era n’esazaamu ebikujjuko by’Omwaka Omupya. Obusuubuzi bw’ebintu ebiguzibwa abantu ba bulijjo (retail sector) bukoseddwa mu nsi yonna, ng’amaduuka gaakendeeza ku ssaawa ze gaggulirawo oba okugira nga gaggaddewo.
translated: Hong Kong yasitula omutindo gwayo ogw’okulwanyisa endwadde ezisiigibwa okutuuka ku ntikko n’elangirira embeera ey’amangu, n’eggalawo amasomero okutuusa mu March n’okusazaamu ebikujjuko by’omwaka omuggya.Ekitongole ky’ebyamaguzi kikoseddwa mu nsi yonna, nga kikendeezeddwa ku ssaawa z’amaduuka oba okuggalwawo okumala akaseera.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: Okugula ebintu ku basuubuzi bano mu Bulaaya ne Latin America kwakendeera ebitundu 40%.
translated: Okukyalira abasuubuzi mu Bulaaya ne Latin America kwakendedde ebitundu 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: Abatunzi ab’ekika kino mu North America ne Middle East baafuna okukendeera kw’emirimu gyabwe kwa bitundu 50–60%.
translated: Abasuubuzi mu North America ne Middle East baalaba okukendeera kwa 50–60%.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: Kino era kyavaamu okukendeera kwa bitundu 33–43% okw’abantu abatambuza ebigere okugenda mu maduuka mu Gwokusatu bw’ogeraageranya n’Ogwokubiri.
translated: Kino nakyo kyavaamu okukendeera kw’ebigere okugenda mu bifo eby’amaduuka mu March ebitundu 33–43% bw’ogeraageranya ne February.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: Abaddukanya ebizimbe by’amaduuka ebinene (shopping malls) okwetooloola ensi bassaawo ebigobererwa ebirala, ng’okwongera ku buyonjo, okussaawo obupima ebbugumu ly’abaguzi, n’okubaako emikolo gye basazaamu. Okusinziira ku kuteebereza kwa United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America, okugwa kw’ebyenfuna okunaaleetebwa ekizibu ky’obulwadde buno kuyinza okuleka abantu abalala abali wakati w’obukadde 14 ne 22 mu bwavu obuyitiridde mu Latin America okusinga nga bwe kyandibadde singa ekizibu kino tekyagwawo.
translated: Abaddukanya ebifo ebinene eby’amaduuka okwetoloola ensi yonna baassaawo enkola endala, gamba ng’okwongera ku buyonjo, okussaawo sikaani z’ebbugumu okukebera ebbugumu ly’abaguzi, n’okusazaamu emikolo.Okusinziira ku kuteebereza kw’akakiiko k’amawanga amagatte ak’ebyenfuna aka Latin America, okusereba kw’eby’enfuna okwaleetebwa ssennyiga omukambwe kuyinza okuva wakati 14 n’abantu obukadde 22 abali mu bwavu obw’ekitalo mu Latin America okusinga bwe bandibadde mu mbeera eyo singa tewaaliwo ssennyiga omukambwe.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: Mu Janwali n’Ogwokubiri 2020, obulwadde we bwasingira okuba obungi mu Wuhan, abantu obukadde nga 5 mu China baafiirwa emirimu gyabwe.
translated: Mu January ne February 2020, mu kiseera ssennyiga omukambwe we yali e Wuhan, abantu nga obukadde butaano mu China baafiirwa emirimu gyabwe.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: Bangi ku bantu mu China abali eyo mu bukadde nga 300 abaddukira mu byalo okukola baakonkomalira awaka mu province z’omunda oba mu Hubei province. Mu Gwokusatu 2020, Abamerika abasoba mu bukadde 10 baafiirwa emirimu gyabwe ne basaba obuyambi bwa gavumenti.
translated: Bangi ku bakozi ababundabunda mu byalo kumpi obukadde 300 mu China babadde basibira waka mu masaza ag’omunda oba okusibira mu ssaza ly’e Hubei.Mu March 2020, Abamerika abasoba mu bukadde 10 baafiirwa emirimu ne basaba obuyambi bwa gavumenti.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: Okubalukawo kwa coronavirus kuyinza okuviirako okufiirwa emirimu obukadde 47 mu Amerika era n’abantu abatalina mirimu ne batuuka ku bitundu 32%, okusinziira ku kuteebereza kwa Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis. Omuggalo mu India gulesse obukadde n’obukadde bw’Abayindi abakozi ba lejjalejja nga tebalina mirimu. Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa Angus Reid Institute kwakizuula ng’ebitundu 44% eby’amaka mu Canada gafunye ku kizibu ky’obutaba na mirimu. Abakozi kyenkana 900,000 baafiirwa emirimu gyabwe mu Spain okuva lwe baagenda mu muggalo mu makkati g’Ogwokusatu 2020.
translated: Ekirwadde kya coronavirus kyandifiiriza emirimu obukadde 47 mu Amerika era ebbula ly’emirimu liyinza okutuuka ku bitundu 32%, okusinziira ku kubalirira kwa Federal Reserve Bank of St okuyita mu musaala gwa buli lunaku) abatalina mirimu.Okunoonyereza okuva mu kitongole kya Angus Reid Institute kwazuula nti amaka 44% mu Canada gafunye ebbula ly’emirimu ery’ekika ekimu.Abakozi kumpi 900,000 baafiirwa emirimu gyabwe mu Spain okuva lwe yagenda mu muggalo mu makkati ga March 2020.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: Mu kitundu ekyokubiri eky’Ogwokusatu, Abakozi mu France obukadde 4 baasaba obuyambi olw’okuba nga tebalina mirimu mu kiseera kino (temporary unemployment benefits) ate abakozi akakadde 1 mu Bungereza baasaba ebbanja ery’awamu (universal credit scheme). Amakampuni emitwalo nga ataano mu Germany baasindika abakozi baabwe ku nkola ya gavumenti ey’okukolera n’okusasulirwa ekiseera ekitonoko emanyiddwa nga Kurzarbeit.
translated: Mu kitundu ekyokubiri ekya March, abakozi ba Bufalansa obukadde buna baasaba ssente z’ebbula ly’emirimu ez’ekiseera ate abakozi b’e Bungereza obukadde 1 ne basaba enteekateeka y’okuwola abantu bonna.Kumpi kkampuni z’obukadde mu Girimaani zisindise abakozi baabwe ku nteekateeka z’okukola ez’ekiseera ekitono eziweebwa ensimbi gavumenti ezimanyiddwa nga Kurzarbeit bwe yali.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: Enkola ya Germany ey’okukolera n’okusasulirwa ekiseera ekitono etandikiddwa ne mu France ne Britain.
translated: Enteekateeka ya Girimaani ey’okuliyirira abantu ku mirimu egy’ekiseera ekitono ebadde eyitibwa Bufalansa ne Bungereza.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: Ebisaawe bya katemba n’okukuuma obuwangwa nabyo bikoseddwa nnyo ekizibu kino, nga kiziŋŋamizza emirmu gy’ebitongole n’abantu ssekinnoomu—abakozesebwa n’abeekozesa—mu nsi yonna.
translated: Ebitundu by’okuzannya emizannyo n’eby’obuwangwa bikoseddwa nnyo ssennyiga omukambwe, nga kikosa emirimu gy’ebibiina awamu n’abantu ssekinnoomu —abakola n’abeetongodde —mu nsi yonna.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: Ebitongole by’okuyiiya n’obuwangwa byagezaako okusigala nga bikola emirimu gyabyo (nga gino gitera okubeera nga gusasulirwa bantu) egy’okukkiriza abantu okugenda mu bifo by’obuwangwa, okukuuma abakozi baabyo n’abantu abalala nga balamu, n’okuyamba abayiiya we kiba kyetaagisizza.
translated: Ebibiina by’ekitongole ky’ebyemikono n’ebyobuwangwa byagezaako okunyweza omulimu gwabyo (ebitera okuweebwa ensimbi okuva mu gavumenti) ogw’okuwa abantu omukisa okufuna eby’obuwangwa, okukuuma obukuumi bw’abakozi baabwe n’abantu bonna, n’okuwagira abayimbi we kisoboka.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: Mu Gwokusatu 2020, mu nsi yonna, amakaddiyiro, amaterekero g’ebitabo, ebifo ewategekerwa ebiyiiye, n’ebitongole by’ebyobuwangwa ebirala byali biggaddwa nga n’emyoleso, n’emikolo emirala gisaziddwamu oba gyongezeddwayo.
translated: We bwatuukira mu March 2020, okwetoloola ensi yonna ne ku ddaala ery’enjawulo, myuziyamu, amaterekero g’ebitabo, ebifo ebisanyukirwamu, n’ebitongole by’ebyobuwangwa ebirala byali biggale ekiseera ekitali kigere ng’emyoleso gyabyo, emikolo n’ebivvulu byabyo byasaziddwamu oba byongezeddwayo.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: Oluvannyuma lwa kino waaliwo kaweefube ow’amaanyi okutuusa ku bantu obuweereza nga bayita ku mikutu gya kompyuta. Ekintu ekirala ekivudde mu bulwadde kwe kuyimiriza obuweereza bw’eddiini, ebyemizannyo, ebintu ebirala ebikwata ku byokwesanyusa, ng’ebivvulu by’ennyimba ne konsati, emisomo gya tekinologiya, n’emikolo gy’emisono.
translated: Mu kwanukula waaliwo kaweefube ow’amaanyi ow’okuwa obuweereza obulala nga bayita mu mikutu gya digito.Ekirala ekiva mu bulwadde buno gye buvuddeko era eky’amangu kwe kusazaamu emikolo gy’eddiini, emikolo emikulu mu mizannyo, n’emikolo emirala egy’omukwano, gamba ng’ebivvulu by’ennyimba n’ebivvulu, enkiiko za tekinologiya, . n’okwolesebwa kw’emisono.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: Ekisaawe kya cinema nakyo kifunye okutaataaganyizibwa. Vatican yalangirira nti okukuza Wiiki Entukuvu mu Rooma, okubaawo mu wiiki y’Ekisiibo esembayo, kusaziddwamu.
translated: Omulimu gwa firimu nagwo gufunye okutaataaganyizibwa.Vatican yalangiridde nti okukuza wiiki entukuvu mu kibuga Rooma, ezibeerawo mu wiiki esembayo mu sizoni y’okunenya kw’Abakristaayo eya Lenti, kusaziddwamu.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
