translated: Amadiini galagira okunaaba mu ngalo olw’obuyonjo n’obw’akabonero.Okunaaba mu ngalo mu ngeri ey’akabonero, nga tukozesa amazzi naye nga tewali ssabbuuni okunaaba mu ngalo, kitundu ku kunaaba mu ngalo mu ngeri ey’emikolo eraga mu madiini mangi, omuli Enzikiriza ya Bahá’í, Enzikiriza y’Abahindu, tevilah ne netilat yadayim mu ddiini y’Ekiyudaaya , Lavabo mu Bukristaayo, ne Wudhu mu Busiraamu.Eddiini era ziragira okunaaba mu ngalo mu ngeri ey’obuyonjo naddala oluvannyuma lw’ebikolwa ebimu.

sourceString: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet.
targetString: Enzikiriza y’Abahindu, ey’Ekiyudaaya n’ey’Ekisiraamu zikubiriza okunaaba mu ngalo ng’omuntu avudde mu kaabuyonjo.
translated: Enzikiriza y’Abahindu, ey’Ekiyudaaya n’Obusiraamu biragidde okunaaba mu ngalo oluvannyuma lw’okukozesa kaabuyonjo.

sourceString: And, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal.
targetString: Era, Abahindu, Babudda, Abasiiki, Abayudaaya n’Abasiraamu bakubiriza okunaaba mu ngalo ng’omuntu tannalya ate ne bw’aba amaze okulya.
translated: Era, Enzikiriza y’Ekihindu, Buddha, Sikh, Eddiini y’Ekiyudaaya n’Obusiraamu biragira okunaaba mu ngalo nga buli mmere tennalya n’oluvannyuma lw’okulya.

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19
targetString: Ebikugira ebizibu ku mirimu ebiva ku COVID-19
translated: Okulwanyisa obulabe ku COVID-19 ku mirimu

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: Ebikugira ebizibu mu mirimu ebiva ku COVID-19 kwe kussaawo enkola z’okwetangira obubenje n’engeri z’okwetangira okukwatibwa obulwadde bwa coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).
translated: Okulwanyisa obulabe ku COVID-19 ku mirimu kwe kukozesa enkola z’obukuumi ku mirimu n’ebyobulamu mu kulwanyisa akabi mu kutangira obulwadde bwa coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).

sourceString: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19.
targetString: Engeri ennungi ez’okutangira obulabe ku mirimu zisinziira ku kifo ewakolerwa n’omulimu ogukolebwa era okusoomooza okwo kusinziira ku kwekaliriza ensibuko y’obulabe, obunene bw’ekizibu ky’obulwadde mu kitundu, n’obulabe obwekwanya n’abakozi kinnoomu abayinza okwanguyirwa okukwatibwa COVID-19.
translated: Okufuga obulungi akabi mu kifo we bakolera kisinziira ku kifo we bakolera n’omulimu gw’omulimu, nga kwesigamiziddwa ku kwekenneenya akabi ku nsibuko z’obulwadde, obuzibu bw’endwadde mu kitundu, n’ensonga z’akabi eri abakozi ssekinnoomu abayinza okuba mu bulabe bw’okukwatibwa COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Okusinziira ku U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), emirimu egirina obulabe obutono girina enkwatagana ntono eyeekwanya n’emirimu n’abantu wamu n’abakozi abalala, era ng’obulabe obw’engeri eyo busobola okukolebwako n’obujjanjabi obutono obusookerwako, okukubiriza abakozi okusigala ewaka bwe baba nga balwadde, empisa ku bikwata ku ngeri y’okussa, wamu n’okufuba okuyonja buli kiseera ekifo ewakolerwa emirimu n’okutta obuwuka mu bifo ebyo.
translated: Okusinziira ku kitongole kya Amerika ekivunaanyizibwa ku by’okwerinda n’ebyobulamu mu mirimu (OSHA), emirimu egy’akabi akatono egy’okukwatibwa tegirina nkolagana ntono ku mulimu n’abantu ne bakozi bannaabwe abalala, nga ku nsonga eno esengekeddwa enkola entongole ez’okuziyiza obulwadde, omuli okunaaba mu ngalo, okukubiriza abakozi okubeera awaka singa baba balwadde , empisa mu kussa, n’okukuuma okuyonja bulijjo n’okutta obuwuka mu mbeera y’emirimu.

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: Emirimu egirina obulabe obutali bwa maanyi nnyo mwe muli egyo egirimu abantu okukwatagana ennyo n’abantu abatamanyiddwa oba abateeberezebwa okuba ne COVID-19, naye nga bayinza okukwatibwa obulwadde obwo olw’okusaasaana kw’obulwadde obwo mu kitundu oba olw’okutambula mu mawanga amalala.
translated: Emirimu egy’akabi ak’okukwatibwa mu bitundu eby’omu makkati mulimu egyo egyetaagisa okukwatagana ennyo oba okumpi n’abantu abatamanyiddwa oba abateeberezebwa okuba ne COVID-19, naye nga bayinza okukwatibwa olw’okusiigibwa mu bantu okugenda mu maaso oba okutambula mu nsi yonna.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: Muno muzingiramu abakozi abakwatana n’abantu abalala, gamba ng’amasomero, ebifo omukolerwa emirimu nga mulimu abantu bangi, n’ebifo by’amaduuka omuli abantu abangi.
translated: Kuno kw’ogatta abakozi abalina enkolagana n’abantu bonna nga mu masomero, embeera z’emirimu ezirimu abantu abangi, n’ebifo ebimu eby’amaduuka ebingi.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: Okutangira obulabe mu bantu bwe batyo okwo nga kw’otadde n’obukodyo obusookerwa obw’okutangira obulwadde, omuli okukozesa obumooli obusengejja obulungi empewo, n’okubeera n’ebyambalo eby’okwesabika omubiri singa wabaawo omulwadde wa COVID-19 awo okumpi.
translated: Okufuga obulabe eri ekibinja kino, ng’oggyeeko enkola entongole ez’okutangira obulwadde, mulimu okuyingiza empewo nga bakozesa ebyuma ebisengejja empewo ebikola obulungi, ebikuuma okusesema, n’okubeera n’ebikozesebwa mu kwekuuma singa omuntu alina ekirwadde kya COVID-19 asanga.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: Enkola ya OSHA efaayo ku basawo/abajjanjabi n’abakolera mu bifo ebikola ku bateeberezebwa okubeera ne COVID-19 kubanga babeera mu bulabe bwa maanyi, era ng’obulabe obwo bweyongera okubeera obw’amaanyi ennyo abakozi abo bwe babaako sampolo ze baggya ku mulambo ogw’omuntu afudde oba ateeberezebwa okuba ng’afudde COVID-19.
translated: OSHA etwala abakozi b’ebyobulamu n’amalaalo abakwatibwa omuntu amanyiddwa oba ateeberezebwa okuba n’obulwadde bwa COVID-19 okuba mu bulabe obw’amaanyi obw’okukwatibwa ekirwadde kya COVID-19, ekyeyongera okutuuka ku bulabe obw’amaanyi ennyo singa abakozi bakola emitendera egy’okuleeta aerosol ku, oba okukung’aanya oba okukwata ebitundu by’omubiri okuva mu, omuntu amanyiddwa oba ateeberezebwa ne COVID-19.

sourceString: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
targetString: Ebikolebwa okutangira obulabe ku bakozi bano mulimu obukodyo mu kuzimba ebizimbe, gamba ng’okutangira empewo okuva mu kisenge ekimu okudda mu kirala, n’ebyokwesabika omubiri ebituukira ku mulimu omuntu gw’akola.
translated: Ebifuga obulabe ebisaanira abakozi bano mulimu ebifuga yinginiya nga ebisenge ebiyingiza empewo ya puleesa embi, n’ebikozesebwa mu kwekuuma ebisaanira omulimu gw’omulimu.

sourceString: COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
targetString: Okubalakulawo kwa COVID-19 kusobola okuvaamu okukosebwa kwa ngeri nnyingi ku mirimu.
translated: Obulwadde bwa COVID-19 buyinza okubaako ebikosa ebiwerako munda mu kifo we bakolera.

sourceString: Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure.
targetString: Abakozi basobola okubula ku mirimu olw’obulwadde, olw’obwetaavu bw’okulabirira abalala, oba nga batya okukwatibwa obulwadde obwo.
translated: Abakozi bayinza obutabaawo ku mulimu olw‟okulwala, okwetaaga okulabirira abalala, oba olw‟okutya nti bayinza okukwatibwa.

sourceString: Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services).
targetString: Ebyobusuubuzi bisobola okukyuka, ku bintu abantu bye baagala ate n’engeri y’okugulamu ebintu ebyo (gamba ng’okugula mu budde obwawuka ku obwo obusinga okugulirwako oba okwagala okubatwalira ebintu gye babyetaaga oba okubeera nga tebava mu bidduka nga batuuse mu bifo ebintu we biri).
translated: Enkola z’obusuubuzi ziyinza okukyuka, mu ngeri y’ebyamaguzi ki ebyetaagisa, n’engeri y’okufunamu ebintu bino (nga okugula ebintu mu ssaawa ezitali za bulijjo oba okuyita mu mpeereza y’okutuusa ebintu oba ey’okuvuga mmotoka).

sourceString: Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted.An infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions.
targetString: Ekisembayo, okusaabaza ebyamaguzi okuva mu bifo ebikoseddwa COVID-19 kuyinza okutaataaganyizibwa. Okweteekerateekera obulwadde obusiigibwa n’engeri y’okubulwanyisa kyetaagisa okuyamba okuluŋŋamya ebikolebwa okubwetangira.
translated: Ekisembayo, okusindika ebintu okuva mu bitundu ebikoseddwa ennyo COVID-19 kuyinza okutaataaganyizibwa.Enteekateeka y’okwetegekera n’okuddamu endwadde ezisiigibwa esobola okukozesebwa okulungamya ebikolwa eby’okwekuuma.

sourceString: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
targetString: Enteekateeka zitunuulira emitendera gy’obulabe egyekwanya n’ebifo ebikolerwamu eby’enjawulo wamu n’emirimu gyennyini, omwo nga mwe muli n’ebivaako okusiiga obulwadde, obulabe obuva ewaka ne mu kitundu, n’ebirala ebivaako obulabe ng’emyaka oba obulwadde obw’olukonvuba.
translated: Enteekateeka zikwata ku mitendera gy‟akabi akakwatagana n‟ebifo eby‟enjawulo eby‟okukoleramu n‟emirimu gy‟emirimu, omuli ensibuko z‟okukwatibwa, ensonga z‟akabi eziva mu mbeera z‟awaka n‟ekitundu, n‟ensonga z‟akabi eri abakozi ssekinnoomu ng‟obukadde oba embeera z‟obujjanjabi ezitawona.

sourceString: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
targetString: Bateekawo n’ebikugira ebyetaagisa okukola ku bulabe obwo, n’enteekateeka ey’okwerinda olw’embeera eyinza okubaawo olw’okubalakawo kw’obulwadde.
translated: Era balambika okufuga okwetaagisa okukola ku bulabe obwo, n’enteekateeka ez’akabenje ku mbeera eziyinza okuva mu kubutuka kw’ekirwadde.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: Okweteekateekera obulwadde obusiigibwa kuyinza okusiziira ku bisembebwa eggwanga lyonna oba ekitundu.
translated: Enteekateeka z’okwetegekera n’okuddamu endwadde ezisiigibwa ziyinza okugoberera ebiteeso by’eggwanga oba eby’amawanga amatono.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
targetString: Ebigendererwa by’okulwanyisa obulwadde obuba bubaluseewo mulimu okukendeeza okusaasaanira mu bakozi, okukuuma abantu abali mu bulabe bw’okukwatibwa obulwadde ne bafuna obuzibu obw’amaanyi, okugenda mu maaso n’emirimu egikolebwa, n’okukendeeza okukosebwa eri abo bizinensi b’ekolagana nabo mu kajegere k’obuweereza bwabwe.
translated: Ebigendererwa by’okuddamu ku bulwadde buno mulimu okukendeeza ku busaasaana mu bakozi, okukuuma abantu abali mu bulabe obw’amaanyi olw’ebizibu ebibi eby’obulamu, okukuuma emirimu gya bizinensi, n’okukendeeza ku buzibu obuva ku bitongole ebirala mu mikutu gyabwe egy’okugaba ebintu.

sourceString: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
targetString: Obukaali bw’obulwadde mu kitundu bizinensi mw’ebeera eri bukosa engeri y’okubulwanyisa.
translated: Obuzibu bw’obulwadde mu kitundu bizinensi gy’eri bukosa eby’okuddamu ebitwalibwa.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: Ensengeka y’okuziyiza obuzibu nkola ekozesebwa ennyo mu nsi mu kwetangira obuzibu ku mirimu ne mu boobulamu mu kubinjawaza enkola ezikozesebwa okusinziira ku bulungi obuzirimu.
translated: Ensengeka y’okufuga akabi nkola ekozesebwa ennyo mu bukuumi n’ebyobulamu ku mirimu okugatta ebifuga obulabe okusinziira ku bulungibwansi.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: Obuzibu bwa COVID-19 we butasobolera kumalibwawo, okutangira okusinga okukola obulungi kwekwo okw’obuyiiya (engineering controls), okwo n’ossaako okutangira okw’obukulembeze (administrative controls) ate n’ekisembayo kwe kw’ebikozesebwa mu kutangira omuntu kinnoomu.
translated: Obulabe bwa COVID-19 we butasobola kuggyibwawo, okufuga okusinga okukola obulungi kwe kufuga kwa yinginiya, okugobererwa okufuga okuddukanya emirimu, n’okusembayo ebyuma eby’okwekuuma.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: Okukugira okw’obuyiiya (Engineering controls) kulimu okuggya abakozi mu buzibu obwekwanya n’emirimu awatali kwesigama ku mpisa ya mulimu era kuno kwe kusinga okubeera obutaba kwa bbeeyi okussa mu nkola.
translated: Okufuga kwa yinginiya kuzingiramu okwawula abakozi okuva ku bulabe obuva ku mulimu awatali kwesigama ku nneeyisa y’abakozi, era kiyinza okuba eky’okugonjoola ekisinga okukendeeza ku nsimbi okussa mu nkola.

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: Okukugira okw’obukulembeze (Administrative controls) z’enkyukakyuka mu nkola y’emirimu oba mu nseetuka y’emirimu ezeetaagisa omukozi oba omukozesa okubaako ky’akola.
translated: Enfuga y’okuddukanya emirimu ze nkyukakyuka mu nkola oba enkola z’emirimu ezeetaagisa omukozi oba omukozesa okukolebwako.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
targetString: Ebyokwesabika (Personal protective equipment, PPE) bitwalibwa obutakola bulungi kwenkana kutangira okw’obuyiiya oba okw’obukulembeze naye nga kusobola okuyambako mu kutangira okukwatibwa obulwadde.
translated: Ebikozesebwa mu kwekuuma (PPE) bitwalibwa ng’ebitali bikola bulungi okusinga okufuga kwa yinginiya n’okuddukanya emirimu, naye bisobola okuyamba okuziyiza ebimu ku bikwatibwa.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: Ebika bya PPE byonna birina okulondebwa okusinziira ku bulabe omukozi bw’ayinza okufuna, birina okuteekebwa we bisaanye okuteekebwa ate bulungi (gamba ng’ebissizzibwamu), okwambalwa obudde bwonna era obulungi, okukeberwako buli kiseera, okulabirirwa, okuzzaawo ebituuse okusikiza, birina okuggyibwa we birina okuggyibwa bulungi nga bwe kyetaagisa, okulongoosebwa, n’okuterekebwa oba okusuulibwa olw’okwewala okuvaako obulwadde.
translated: Ebika bya PPE byonna birina okulondebwa okusinziira ku bulabe eri omukozi, okuteekebwa obulungi nga bwe kisoboka (okugeza, ebyuma ebissa), okwambalibwa bulijjo era obulungi, okwekebejjebwa buli kiseera, okulabirira, n’okukyusibwa, nga bwe kyetaagisa, era okuggyibwawo obulungi, okuyonjebwa, n’okutereka oba okusuulibwa okwewala okufuuka obucaafu.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
targetString: Okusinziira ku U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), emirimu egitaliimu nnyo bulabe girimu enkwatagana y’abantu b’ebweru ne bakozi bannaabwe ntono.
translated: Okusinziira ku kitongole kya Amerika ekivunaanyizibwa ku by’okwerinda n’ebyobulamu ku mirimu (OSHA), emirimu egy’akabi akatono egy’okukwatibwa tegirina nkolagana ntono ku mirimu n’abantu ne bakozi bannaabwe abalala.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Ebikolebwa ebisookerwako ebisembebwa ku mirimu gyonna bizingiramu okunaaba mu ngalo ate bulungi, okukubiriza abakozi okubeera ewaka bwe baba nga balwadde, empisa mu kunyiza oba okwasimula omuli okubikka ku mimwa ng’oli akolola oba ayasimula, okuwa abantu obupapula obw’okwerongoosa n’ebisuulibwamu obupapula bw’okwerongoosa, okwetegekera okuwuliziganyiza ku ssimu oba okuwaanyisiganya mu mirimu bwe kiba nga kyetaagisa, okukubiriza abakozi obutakozesa bikozesebwa bannaabwe, n’okulongoosa ekifo ewakolerwa buli kiseera ate n’okufuba okutta obuwuka.
translated: Ebintu ebikulu eby’okuziyiza obuwuka ebisemba okuteesebwako mu bifo byonna we bakolera mulimu okunaaba mu ngalo enfunda eziwera era mu bujjuvu, okukubiriza abakozi okusigala awaka singa baba balwadde, empisa mu kussa omuli okubikka okusesema n’okusesema, okuwaayo ebitundu by’omubiri n’ebifo ebiteekebwamu kasasiro, okwetegekera emirimu egy’oku ssimu oba okukyusakyusa mu ngeri ey’okutambulatambula bwe kiba kyetaagisa, okumalamu abakozi amaanyi okuva ku kukozesa ebikozesebwa n’ebikozesebwa by’abalala, n’okukuuma okuyonja okwa bulijjo n’okutta obuwuka mu mbeera y’emirimu.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: Okuzuula amangu abantu abateeberezebwa okuba abalwadde ate n’okubaawula mu balala kiyamba okutaasa abakozi, bakasitooma, abagenyi n’abalala mu bifo ebikolerwamu.
translated: Okuzuula amangu n’okwawula abantu abayinza okukwatibwa obulwadde buno ddaala ddene nnyo mu kukuuma abakozi, bakasitoma, abagenyi, n’abalala mu kifo we bakolera.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention(CDC) esemba abakozi abalina obubonero bw’obulwadde obukwata omussizo (acute respiratory illness) basigale ewaka okutuusa ng’omusujja gubaamuse, nga baweddeko obubonero bw’omusujja, n’obubonero obulala okumala waakiri essaawa 24 nga tebakozesezza ddagala likkakkanya musujja era nti enkola z’okuwummuza abakozi ku mirimu zirina okuba nga zisobola okukyusibwakyusibwa, okukkiriza abakozi okusigala ewaka okulabirira abalwadde, era nti abakozi balina okubeera nga bamanyi bulungi enkola zino.
translated: Ekitongole kya Amerika ekivunaanyizibwa ku kulwanyisa endwadde (CDC) kiwa amagezi nti abakozi abalina obubonero bw’obulwadde obw’amaanyi obw’okussa balina okubeera awaka okutuusa nga tebalina musujja, obubonero bw’omusujja, n’obubonero obulala bwonna okumala waakiri essaawa 24 nga tebakozesezza... eddagala erikendeeza omusujja oba eddala erikyusa obubonero, era nti enkola z’oluwummula lw’obulwadde zikyukakyuka, zikkiriza abakozi okusigala awaka okulabirira omuntu omulwadde mu maka, era nti abakozi bamanyi enkola zino.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: Okusinziira ku OSHA, emirimu egirimu obulabe obutonotono mulimu egyo egyetaagisa abantu okusemberegana buli kiseera mu bbanga ery’effuuti omukaaga (1.8 m) ku bantu abatamanyiddwa nti balina oba bateeberezebwa okubeera ne COVID-19, naye nga bayinza okuba nga balina SARS-CoV-2 olw’okusaasaana kw’obulwadde obwo mu kitundu bizinensi eyo mw’eri oba olw’okuba omuntu oyo yagendako mu nsi ez’ebweru mu kifo ekimanyiddwa nga kikoseddwa COVID-19.
translated: Okusinziira ku kitongole kya OSHA, emirimu egy’akabi ak’okukwatibwa kwa wakati mulimu egyo egyetaagisa okukwatagana ennyo oba okumpi mu ffuuti mukaaga (mita 1.8) okuva ku bantu abatamanyiddwa oba abateeberezebwa okuba abalwadde ba COVID-19, naye nga bayinza okukwatibwa obulwadde bwa SARS-CoV-2 olw’ekitundu ekigenda mu maaso okusiigibwa okwetooloola ekifo we bakolera bizinensi, oba olw’okuba omuntu oyo yaakatambula mu nsi yonna mu kifo ekirimu okusaasaana kwa COVID-19 okuyitiridde.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.
targetString: Muno mulimu abakozi abakwatagana n’abantu abalala gamba ng’ab’omu masomero, ebifo ebikolerwamu emirimu abantu abangi, n’ebifo by’amaduuka ebirimu omujjuzo. Okutangira okw’obuyiiya (Engineering controls) ku bifo bino n’ebibinja ebiri mu bulabe obw’amaanyi mulimu okuteeka obutimba obusengejja ennyo empewo ku bizimbe, okwongeza ku bunene bw’obumooli, okuteekawo obuntu obulinga obusenge obusiikiriza omuntu ng’akuba emyasi, n’okuteekawo eddirisa abajja okugula nga bali mu mmotoka mwe baweererezebwa nga tebavuddeemu. Okutangira okw’obukulembeze (Administrative controls) ku kibinja kino ekirimu obuzibu obuneneko mulimu okukubiriza abakozi okusigala ewaka, okusikiza enkiiko ezirimu okulabagana maaso-ku-maaso ne zizzibwa ku yintaneeti, okuteekawo okukolera mu mpalo, okusazaamu okutambula okuteetaagisa nnyo mu bifo ebirimu ennyo obulwadde bwa COVID-19, okutondawo enteekateeka y’empuliziganya ey’amangu omuli n’okukola ku nsonga z’abakozi, okuwa abakozi amawulire agakwata ku COVID-19 wamu n’okubasomesa ku bulwadde obwo wamu n’engeri gye bayinza okubwekuuma, okusomesa abakozi abeetaaga okukozesa engoye ez’okwesabika n’okubalaga engeri y’okukozesa ebyuma bye baba balina okukozesa, okuwa abakozi eby’okukozesa n’okubassa mu bifo ebisobola okuyonjebwa obulungi n’abantu kinnoomu okubeereramu abayonjo, okukubiriza abakozi okunaaba mu ngalo buli kiseera, okukugira bakasitoma n’abantu abalala okutuuka mu kiro ewakolerwa, n’okuteekawo ebipande ebikubiriza abantu okunaaba mu ngalo n’obubaka obulala obw’okwekuuma COVID-19. Okusinziira ku mulimu nga bwe guba gufaanana, abakozi ababa mu buzibu bw’okusiigibwa obulwadde basaana ne beesabika omuli okwambala giraavu, egganduula, akakookolo n’ebigaalubindi.
translated: Mu bino mulimu abakozi abalina enkolagana n’abantu bonna nga mu masomero, embeera z’emirimu ezirimu abantu abangi, n’ebifo ebimu eby’amaduuka ebingi.Ebifuga bya yinginiya ku kino n’ebibinja eby’akabi ak’amaanyi mulimu okuteeka ebyuma ebisengejja empewo ebikola obulungi, okwongera ku miwendo gy’empewo , okuteeka ebiziyiza ebirabika ng’ebikuuma okusesema eby’obuveera obutangaavu, n’okussaawo eddirisa eriyita mu mmotoka okuweereza bakasitoma.Ebifuga mu buddukanya kino n’ebibinja eby’akabi ennyo mulimu okukubiriza abakozi abalwadde okusigala awaka, okukyusa enkiiko za maaso ku maaso n’empuliziganya ey’omubiri, . okuteekawo enkyukakyuka ezitambula, okukomya entambula ezitali za mugaso mu bifo omuli ekirwadde kya COVID-19 ekigenda mu maaso, okukola enteekateeka z’empuliziganya ez’amangu omuli n’olukiiko olw’okuddamu ebiruma abakozi, okuwa abakozi okusomesebwa n’okutendeka ku mulembe ku nsonga ezireeta COVID-19 n’enneeyisa ey’okwekuuma, okutendeka abakozi abeetaaga okukozesa engoye n’ebikozesebwa ebikuuma engeri y’okubikozesaamu, okuwa eby’obugagga n’embeera y’emirimu etumbula obuyonjo bw’omuntu, okwetaagisa okunaaba mu ngalo buli kiseera, okukomya bakasitoma n’abantu bonna okutuuka mu kifo we bakolera, n’okuteeka ebipande ebikwata ku kunaaba mu ngalo n’ebirala Ebikozesebwa mu kwekuuma COVID-19.Okusinziira ku mulimu gw’omulimu, abakozi abali mu bulabe obw’okukwatibwa waakiri obwa wakati bayinza okwetaaga okwambala eby’okwekuuma omuli ebimu ebigatta ggalavu, gomesi, engabo ya ffeesi oba masiki mu maaso, oba endabirwamu.

sourceString: Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators.
targetString: Abakozi abali mu kibinja ekirina obuzibu eky’engeri eno tebatera kwetaaga kukozesa bikozesebwa kussa.
translated: Abakozi mu kibinja kino eky’akabi tebatera kwetaaga kukozesa byuma bya kussa.

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Omuntu bw’alwalira ku nnyonyi, engeri ennungi ez’okutangira abakozi n’abasaabaze abalala mulimu okwawula omuntu omulwadde okuva ku balala ne bamuwa ebbanga lya fuuti 6, okufuna omu ku bakozi okulabirira omulwadde oyo, n’okuwa akakookolo omuntu oyo omulwadde oba okusaba omuntu oyo omulwadde okubikka omumwa n’ennyindo n’obupapula obukozesebwa okwerongoosa ng’akolola oba okwasimula.
translated: Singa omuntu alwala ku nnyonyi, okufuga okutuufu okukuuma abakozi n’abasaabaze abalala mulimu okwawula omulwadde ku balala ebanga lya ffuuti 6, okulonda omukozi omu okuweereza omulwadde, n’okuwa omulwadde masiki mu maaso oba okusaba omulwadde okubikka akamwa n’ennyindo n’ebitundu by’omubiri ng’asesema oba ng’asesema.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
targetString: Abakozi b’oku nnyonyi balina okwambala giraavu ezikozesebwa omulundi ogumu nga baweereza omusaabaze omulwadde oba nga bakwata ku luzzizzi oluva mu mubiri oba ku kintu ekirabika nga kigenzeeko obuwuka, n’okwesabika singa omuntu gwe baweereza alabika ng’alina omusujja, akolola olutata, oba ng’azibuwalirwa mu kussa.
translated: Abakozi mu kabina balina okwambala ggalavu z’obujjanjabi ezikozesebwa omulundi gumu nga balabirira omutambuze omulwadde oba nga bakwata ku mazzi g’omubiri oba ebifo ebiyinza okubaamu obucaafu, era nga kiyinzika okuba n’ebyuma ebirala eby’okwekuuma singa omutambuze omulwadde aba n’omusujja, okusesema okutambula, oba okukaluubirirwa okussa.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
targetString: Giraavu n’ebirala ebikozesebwa omulundi ogumu bisaanye okussibwa mu kaveera akasuulibwamu ebintu ng’ebyo (biohazard bag), n’ebintu ebiddugaziddwa ne birongoosebwa era ne bifuuyirwako eddagala oluvannyuma. Ate amaato agasaabaza ebyamaguzi omuli n’emmeeri z’abasaabaze, ebitangira obulabe bye bino, okwongezaayo okutambula ng’oli mulwadde, okweyawula n’okutegeeza abakozi b’oku lyato bw’owulira omusujja oba obubonero obulala ng’oli ku lyato.
translated: Gloves n’ebintu ebirala ebisuulibwa birina okusuulibwa mu nsawo y’obulabe eri ebiramu, ate ebifo ebirimu obucaafu birina okuyonjebwa n’okutta obuwuka oluvannyuma.Ku mmeeri ez’obusuubuzi, omuli emmeeri ezitambula n’amaato amalala agasaabaza abantu, okulwanyisa akabi mulimu okwongezaayo entambula ng’oli mulwadde, n’okwekutula n’okutegeeza ekifo eky’obujjanjabi ekiri ku lyato amangu ddala singa omuntu afuna omusujja oba obubonero obulala ng’ali ku lyato.

sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: Ekituufu kiri nti, okulondoola omulwadde kulina okukolebwa mu kasenge omulwadde mw’aba ateereddwa. Ate ku masomero ne mu bifo ebirabirirwamu abaana, CDC esemba okuggalawo okumala akaseera katono ekifo kisobole okuyonjebwa n’okutta obuwuka singa omuntu omulwadde aba abadde mu kizimbe ky’essomero ne bwe kiba nti mu kitundu ekyo bubadde tebusaasaanye.
translated: Ekisinga obulungi, okugoberera abasawo kulina okubaawo mu kabina y’omuntu eyeetongodde.Ku masomero n’ebifo eby’okulabirira abaana, CDC egamba nti okuggalwa okw’ekiseera ekitono okusobola okuyonja oba okutta obuwuka singa omuntu alina akawuka abadde mu kizimbe ky’essomero awatali kulowooza ku kusaasaana kw’ekitundu.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: Bwe waba nga waliwo okusaasaana kw’obulwadde okusaamusaamu mu kitundu, obukodyo bw’okweyawula busobola okukozesebwa, gamba ng’okusazaamu okulambula, okusimba ennyiriri ku ssomero, n’enkuŋŋaana endala ennene gamba ng’okukola dduyiro oba ebibiina ebya kkwaya oba okuliira awamu mu ddiiro ly’essomero, okwongeza ku mabanga ku ntebe z’abayizi, okukyusakyusa mu budde abaana mwe bajjira ne bwe baddirayo ewaka, okukendeeza ku bagenyi abateetaagisa nnyo, n’okukozesa woofiisi ey’enjawulo ey’ebyobulamu ku baana abalina obubonero obulinga obwa ssenyiga.
translated: Bwe wabaawo okusaasaanya okutono oba okw’ekigero mu kitundu, enkola z’okubeera ewala mu bantu zisobola okuteekebwa mu nkola ng’okusazaamu okugenda mu nnimiro, enkuŋŋaana, n’enkuŋŋaana endala ennene ng’okutendeka omubiri oba emisomo gya kkwaaya oba okulya mu kafeero, okwongera ku kifo wakati w’emmeeza, okutuuka n’okugobwa mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa emirundi, okukomya abagenyi abatalina mugaso, n’okukozesa ekifo eky’enjawulo ekya ofiisi y’ebyobulamu eri abaana abalina obubonero obulinga obwa ssennyiga.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: Bwe wabaawo okusaasaana okw’amaanyi mu kitundu, ku kakodyo k’okwewa amabanga, kisaana okwongerako n’okuggala amasomero okumala ebbanga eriwera. Eri abakuumaddembe abakola emirimu gya buli lunaku, obulabe bw’okukwatibwa obulwadde butwalibwa CDC okuba nga butono nnyo ddala.
translated: Bwe wabaawo okusaasaana okw’amaanyi mu kitundu, ng’oggyeeko enkola z’okubeera ewala mu bantu, okugobwa mu masomero okumala ebbanga eddene kuyinza okulowoozebwako.Eri abakuumaddembe abakola emirimu egya bulijjo, akabi ak’amangu ak’obulamu katwalibwa ng’akatono CDC.

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: Abakuumaddembe abalina okukwatagana n’abantu abakakasiddwa nti balina COVID-19 baweebwa amagezi okugoberera enkola ze zimu ng’abajjanjabi ab’amangu, omuli n’okukozesa ebyokwesabika omubiri gwonna.
translated: Abakuuma ddembe abalina okukwatagana n’abantu ssekinnoomu abakakasiddwa oba abateeberezebwa okuba n’ekirwadde kya COVID-19 basemba okugoberera ebiragiro bye bimu n’abakugu mu by’obujjanjabi obw’amangu, omuli n’ebikozesebwa ebituufu eby’okwekuuma.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: Okukwatagana bwe kubaawo ng’omuntu akwatibwa, abakozi balina okulongoosa n’okufuuyira obuwuka ku byambalo byabwe nga tebannaddamu kubikozesa nga bakozesa eddagala erifuuyira mu nju oba okusiimula, n’okugoberera emitendera egimanyiddwa wonna mu kulongoosa ebyokwesabika wamu n’okwoza engoye.
translated: Singa wabaawo okukwatagana okw’okumpi nga bakwatibwa, abakozi balina okuyonja n’okutta obuwuka mu musipi gwabwe ne ggiya nga tebannaddamu kukozesa ddagala erifuuyira oba okusiimuula mu maka, n’okugoberera enkola ezituufu ez’okukola ku kuziyiza n’okusuula PPE ezikozesebwa n’okuteeka n’okwoza engoye.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: OSHA kitwala abakozi b’ebyobulamu abamu n’abakola mu mawanika okubeera mu buzibu obw’amaanyi ennyo ddala ku kukwatibwa obulwadde.
translated: OSHA etwala abakozi abamu mu by’obulamu n’amaggwa nga bali mu biti bya waggulu oba ebya waggulu ennyo eby’akabi ak’okukwatibwa.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Emirimu egireetera abantu okubeera mu mbeera ey’obulabe ennyo mulimu abalabirira abalwadde ewaka, ababawanirira, abakola mu magezeserezo, n’abagoba b’abebyobulamu abasemberera abalwadde abamanyiddwa oba abateeberezebwa okuba nti balina COVID-19.
translated: Emirimu egy’akabi ak’okukwatibwa ennyo mulimu okutuusa ebyobulamu, okuwagira, laboratory, n’abakozi b’entambula y’ebyobujjanjabi abakwatibwa abalwadde ba COVID-19 abamanyiddwa oba abateeberezebwa.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Bano babeera mu bulabe obw’amaanyi ddala, abakozi bwe beenyigira mu mitendera egirimu okupima omukka (aerosol-generating procedures) ku balwadde, oba bwe bakwata ku sampolo okuva ku bantu abamanyiddwa oba abateeberezebwa okubeera ne COVID-19.
translated: Bino bifuuka bya bulabe bwa maanyi nnyo obw’okukwatibwa singa abakozi bakola emitendera egy’okuleeta aerosol ku, oba okukung’aanya oba okukwata ebigezo okuva mu, abalwadde ba COVID-19 abamanyiddwa oba abateeberezebwa.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: Mu mitendera gy’okupika omukka (aerosol-generating procedures) mulimu okuleetera omuntu okukolola, bronchoscopies, emitendera egirimu okukola n’okukebera amannyo (dental procedures), oba invasive specimen collection.
translated: Enkola ezikola aerosol mulimu okussa mu nnyindo, okusesema, okukebera ennyindo, enkola ezimu ez’amannyo n’okukeberebwa, oba okukung’aanya ebitundu by’amannyo mu ngeri ey’okuyingira mu mubiri.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: Emirimu egirimu obulabe obw’amaanyi egy’okukola ku bafu mulimu egy’okutegeka emibiri gy’abantu ababadde bamanyiddwa nti balwadde oba nga bateeberezebwa okuba ne COVID-19 mu kiseera we baafiira; bano babeera mu bulabe bwa maanyi ddala bwe bakebera omulambo. Okutangira kw’obuyiiya (engineering controls) ku bibinja by’abantu bano abali mu bulabe obw’amaanyi mulimu okukozesa ebisenge okwawula abalwadde abamanyiddwa nti balwadde oba abateeberezebwa okubeera ne COVID-19, omwo nga mwe muli n’emirundi okupika omukka (aerosol-generating procedures) lwe kuba kukoleddwa.
translated: Emirimu gy’amasiro egy’akabi ennyo mulimu abakozi abeenyigira mu kutegeka emirambo gy’abantu abaali bamanyi oba nga bateebereza nti balina ekirwadde kya COVID-19 mu kiseera we baafiira; bino bifuuka bya bulabe bwa maanyi nnyo singa bakola okwekebejja omulambo.Ebirala yinginiya ebifuga ebibinja bino eby’akabi mulimu ebisenge eby’okwawula abalwadde abalina ekirwadde kya COVID-19 ekimanyiddwa oba ekiteeberezebwa, omuli n’emitendera egy’okukola aerosol bwe gikolebwa.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: Enkola eya specialized negative pressure ventilation eyinza okuba ennungi mu mbeera z’ebyobulamu ezimu n’enkwata y’emirambo.
translated: Okuyingiza empewo mu puleesa etali nnungi mu ngeri ey’enjawulo kiyinza okuba ekituufu mu bifo ebimu eby’ebyobulamu n’amalaalo.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: Sampolo eziggyibwa ku bantu zirina kukwatibwa n’obwegendereza obw’amaanyi ddala (Biosafety Level 3 precautions).
translated: Ebika by’ebimera birina okukwatibwa n’okwegendereza kwa Biosafety Level 3.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: WHO esemba abalwadde abapya okwawulibwa nga bassibwa mu bifo ebirindirwamu eby’enjawulo bwe baba nga bateeberezebwa okubeera ne COVID-19. Okwongereza ku nkola endala eza PPE, OSHA esemba okukozesa ebyuma ebissizibwamu eri abo abakolera mu bbanga erya fuuti 6 nga baliraanye abalwadde ba SARS-CoV-2 oba abateeberezebwa okuba nabwo wamu n’abo abakola ku mitendera gy’okupima omukka (aerosol-generating procedures).
translated: Ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu mu nsi yonna (WHO) kiwa amagezi abalwadde abayingira okwawulwamu mu bifo eby’enjawulo mwe balindirira okusinziira ku oba nga bateeberezebwa okuba n’obulwadde bwa COVID-19.Ng’oggyeeko PPE endala, OSHA egamba nti ebyuma ebissa omukka eri abo abakola mu ffuuti 6 okuva ku balwadde abamanyiddwa okuba , oba abateeberezebwa okuba, balina obulwadde bwa SARS-CoV-2, n’abo abakola emitendera egy’okukola aerosol.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: Mu America, obukookolo bwa N95 obwakakasibwa NIOSH oba obusingawo bulina kukozesebwa mu mbeera etegekeddwa obulungi omuli okusooka okubugezesa, okutendeka ababukozesa, okutendekebwa, ne mu kukebera kw’ekisawo.
translated: Mu Amerika, ebyuma ebissa mu maaso ebisengejja N95 ebikkirizibwa NIOSH oba okusingawo birina okukozesebwa mu mbeera y’enteekateeka enzijuvu, ewandiikiddwa ey’okukuuma okussa omuli okukebera omubiri, okutendekebwa, n’okukeberebwa kw’abasawo.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: Ebika by’ebissizibwamu ebirala bisobola okuyamba mu ngeri esingako n’okugumya abakozi nga bakola egyabwe. WHO tesemba kukozesa ovulo kubanga COVID-19 bulwadde bwa mu mussizo so tebutambulizibwa mu luzzizzi lwa mu mubiri.
translated: Ebika by’ebyuma ebissa ebirala bisobola okuwa obukuumi obusingako n’okutereeza obuweerero bw’abakozi.Ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu tekiteesa ku coveralls, anti COVID-19 bulwadde bwa kussa okusinga okusiigibwa okuyita mu mazzi g’omubiri.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: WHO esembe okukozesa akakookolo akakozesebwa mu kulongoosa abalwadde eri abakola ku kusunsula abalwadde.
translated: WHO egamba nti abakozi abakebera ebifo we bayingira bateeke masiki yokka ey’okulongoosa.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Eri abo abaggya sampolo z’omu mussizo ku bantu, abalabiriraa, oba abatambuza abalwadde ba COVID-19 awatali kukozesa aerosol-generating procedures, WHO esemba okukozesa akakookolo akakozesebwa mu kulongoosa, gaalubindi oba ekibikka ku maaso, ne giraavu.
translated: Ku abo abakung’aanya ebipimo by’okussa okuva mu balwadde ba COVID-19, abalabirira, oba abatambuza nga tebalina nkola yonna efulumya aerosol, WHO egamba nti balina masiki ey’okulongoosa, endabirwamu, oba engabo mu maaso, gomesi, ne ggalavu.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Omutendera gw’okupima omukka (aerosol-generating procedure) bwe gukolebwa, akakookolo akakozesebwa mu kulongoosa kasikizibwa N95 oba FFP2 respirator.
translated: Singa enkola ekola aerosol ekolebwa, masiki y’okulongoosa ekyusibwamu n’efuulibwa ekyuma ekissa ekya N95 oba FFP2.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: Olw’okuba nti ebyokwesabika (PPE) tebimala, WHO esemba okukendeeza ku kukozesa ebyokwesabika nga bakozesa okujjanjaba naye ng’omusawo n’omulwadde tebasisinkanye (telemedicine), okukozesa ebisiikiriza gamba ng’amadirisa agatangaala, okukkiriza abo bokka abajjanjaba obutereevu okuyingira ekisenge n’omulwadde wa COVID-19, okukozesa ebyokwesabika ebyo byokka ebyetaagisa ku ekyo ekikolebwa, okukozesa ekissizibwamu ekimu ng’olabirira abalwadde abawera abalina obulwadde obw’engeri emu, okulondoola n’okukwanaganya embunyisa y’ebyokwesabika, n’obutakkiriza kukozesa bukookolo eri abalwadde abatalabikirako bubonero.
translated: Okusinziira ku ngeri PPE y’ensi yonna gy’etamala, WHO egamba okukendeeza ku bwetaavu bwa PPE nga bayita mu kujjanjaba okuva ku ssimu, ebiziyiza mu mubiri ng’amadirisa amatangaavu, okusobozesa abo bokka abeenyigira mu kulabirirwa obutereevu okuyingira mu kisenge omuli omulwadde wa COVID-19, nga bakozesa PPE yokka eyeetaagisa ku mulimu ogw’enjawulo, okugenda mu maaso n’okukozesa ekyuma ky’okussa kye kimu nga tokiggyeemu nga bwe balabirira abalwadde abawera abalina obulwadde bwe bumu, okulondoola n’okukwasaganya enkola y’okugaba PPE, n’okumalamu amaanyi okukozesa masiki eri abantu ssekinnoomu abatalina bubonero.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: OKUVA EWA: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
translated: OKUVA: Katherine Maher, akulira ekitongole kya Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: ERI: Abakozi ba Wikimedia Foundation
translated: TO: Abakozi bonna aba Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: ENSONGA: [Covid-19] Okukendeeza ku mirimu n’okwetegekera ebiseera eby’omu maaso
translated: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Okuweweeza omugugu n'okwetegekera ebiseera eby'omu maaso

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: ENNAKU Z’OMWEZI/ESSAAWA LW’ESINDIKIDDWA: 14 Ogwokusatu, 2020, 00:24 UTC
translated: OLUNAKU/ESSAAWA Y'OKWEWereza: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: LAYISINSI: CC0: Tewali ddembe lyesigaliziddwa
translated: LICENSING: CC0: Tewali ddembe liri mu buyinza bwaffe

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Tuli mu mbeera etali nnyangu omwezi guno.
translated: Twesanga mu mbeera eyeewuunyisa omwezi guno.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: Nawookeera wa COVID-19 atulaze bulungi nti abantu bonna mu nsi bakolagana era babeerana era buli omu alina obuvunaanyizibwa eri munne.
translated: Ssenyiga COVID-19 kintu ekitangaaza obulungi enkolagana yaffe ey’abantu mu nsi yonna n’obuvunaanyizibwa bwe tulina eri bannaffe.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Tetulina kyakulabirako ku kusoomoozebwa kuno, naye tumanyi nti okwanukula kwaffe kusinziira ku kulumirirwa wonna mu nsi, enkolagana, n’obukolaganyi mu bantu obuzimbirwamu ekitongole kino.
translated: Tetulina kyakulabirako ku kusoomoozebwa kwayo, naye tukimanyi nti okuddamu kwaffe okusinga kwesigamye ku kika ky’okusaasira kw’ensi yonna, okukolagana, n’okuzimba ekitundu ekitudde ku mutima gw’ekibiina kino.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: Obwasseruganda n’okufaayo kwe tulabye mu bannaffe nga batuwandiikira email, nga bakuba amasimu, n’okunyumya ku ssimu kiraga bulungi nti abantu be tukolagana nabo balumirirwa era tuli ba mukisa okukolagana nabo.
translated: Obunywanyi n’okufaayo kwe tulabye mu bannaffe bonna ku email, essimu, n’okukubaganya ebirowoozo, kukakasa okwewuunyisa okw’abantu abatali ba bulijjo be tulina omukisa okukola nabo.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: Sirina ngeri ya njawulo gye nnyinza kubeebazaamu mikwano gyange.
translated: Siyinza kusinga kwebaza na kwenyumiriza mu kubabala mwenna nga bannange.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: Wiiki ewedde, waliwo omuntu eyanneebazizza olw’emirimu gye tukola.
translated: Wiiki ewedde, waliwo eyanjogerako engeri gye basiima omulimu gwaffe.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Kyanzijukizizza obukulu bw’ensi okuddukira ku Wikipedia mu kiseera kino, nti era kano kabonero ka maanyi akalaga nti Wikipedia ya muwendo nnyo era esaana ebeere ku yintaneeti buli muntu emugase.
translated: Banzijukiza engeri gye kiri eky’amakulu ensi okusobola okuddukira ku Wikipedia mu kiseera kino, era nga kabonero ka maanyi nnyo eky’obugagga kino ekikulu okusigala ku mutimbagano era nga kifunibwa bonna.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Omulimu gwo gw’okola gutusobozesa okutuuka ku buwanguzi buno, ng’oyamba okubeezaawo omukutu ku yintaneeti, ng’oyamba okusasula abakozi baffe oba abantu okubeera mu mbeera etaliimu bulabe.
translated: Omulimu gwo gusobozesa kino, oba okuuma emikutu gisigala nga giyimiridde oba bannaffe basasulwa oba ebitundu byaffe nga tebirina bulabe.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Mu kiseera kino, ensi yeetaaga obubaka obuli ku Wikipedia okusinga obwedda bwonna.
translated: Ensi yeetaaga amawulire Wikipedia g’ewa, kati okusinga bwe kyali kibadde.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Kino kye kiseera mwe tulabira nti ebintu bye tukola n’engeri gye tubikolamu biyamba okubaako kye bikola mu nsi.
translated: Kano kaseera nga si bye tukola byokka, wabula n’engeri gye tubikolamu, bijja kukola kinene ku nsi.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: N’olw’omugaso gw’okwewaayo kuno ate n’omulimu gwo ku nsonga eno, tujja kubaako enkyukakyuka ze tukola mu ngeri gye tukolamu okutandika ne wiiki eyo ejja.
translated: Olw’obukulu bw’obutume buno n’omulimu gwo mu gwo, tugenda kuba tukola enkyukakyuka ez’amaanyi mu ngeri gye tukolaganamu, okutandika ne wiiki eno ejja.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Okukyusakyusa mu mirimu n’enteekateeka zaffe
translated: Ennongoosereza mu mirimu gyaffe n’enteekateeka zaffe

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Nga Robyn bwe yagamba emabegako awo, akakiiko kaasisinkanye mu kiro ekyayise okwogeraganya ku nkola yaffe n’enteekateeka yaffe enaagobererwa mu nnaku n’emyezi egijja.
translated: Nga Robyn bwe yayogeddeko emabegako, ttiimu ya c yatudde ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkola yaffe n’enteekateeka y’ennaku n’emyezi egijja.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: Mu mboozi yaffe, twayogedde ku kye tulowooza nti y’engeri gye twandyeteeseteeseemu olw’obuzibu bwe twolekedde n’engeri esinga obulungi ey’okukuuma ekitongole okubeera nga kitambula mu kiseera kino.
translated: Mu mboozi eyo, twalowooza ku kye twalowooza nti kyandibadde kya kuddamu ekituufu eri bye twolekedde n’engeri esinga obulungi ey’okukuuma ekibiina nga kiyimiridde mu kiseera kino.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Ffenna wamu twayagadde okweggyako okunyigirizibwa tuwagire ekyetume kyaffe okumala ebbanga eriwera.
translated: Okusinga twagala okuggyawo situleesi n’okuwagira omulimu gwaffe ogw’ekiseera ekiwanvu.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Bw’oba ng’oyagala okuddamu okukuba, tewali buzibu.
translated: Bw’oba weetaaga okuddamu okukuba essimu, ekyo si kibi.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: Eri abakozi bonna, bakontulakita, n’abakozi ab’ekiseera:
translated: Ku bakozi bonna, abakola kontulakiti, n’abakozi abakola kontulakiti:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: tusuubira okukola essaawa 4 buli lunaku oba essaawa 20 mu wiiki okutuusa lwe tunaddamu okukyusa eyo gye bujja.
translated: ebisuubirwa byaffe eby’okukola buli lunaku bijja kuba nga essaawa 4 olunaku, oba essaawa 20 mu wiiki okutuusa nga tuzzeemu okutegeezebwa.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Tetulangiridde luwummula – bw’oba ng’osobola okukola okusinga ku ssaawa ezo, ekitongole kino kisobola okukukozesa.
translated: Tetulangirira luwummula - bw'oba osobola okukola essaawa ezisingako eza bulijjo, emisomo esobola okukukozesa.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Wabula, mu kiseera kino kati ensi teteeberezeka era bw’oba ng’oyagala kulabirira baagalwa bo, okugula ebyokukozesa ewaka, oba okugenda mu ddwaliro, bw’obeera omulamu naffe kye tusinga okwagala.
translated: Kyokka, ensi tetegeerekeka mu kiseera kino, era ka kibe nti weetaaga okulabirira abaagalwa bo, okufuna eby’okulya oba okugenda ew’omusawo, obulamu bwo obulungi kye kikulembeza.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Tetugenda kulondoola budde bwo.
translated: Tetulondoola budde bwo.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Bw’oba ng’oli mulwadde, tokola.
translated: Bw’oba mulwadde, tokola.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Kino twandibadde tetukyogerako naye tulabye nga kisaana okwogerako.
translated: Kino kisaana okugenda nga tekikwogera, naye ffe tukyogera.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: Ennaku z’okulwala oba okusasulwa olw’obutaba ku mulimu tebyetaagisa – tegeeza butegeeza maneja wo era oyambe b’okola nabo okukyusa mu by’otegese okukola okukakasa nti ebitegekeddwa okukola byonna bifiibwako.
translated: Tekyetaagisa nnaku za bulwadde oba PTO - buulira maneja wo era oyambe ttiimu yo okuddamu okutunula mu kalenda n’enteekateeka okukakasa nti ebitundu ebikulu eby’emirimu bikwatibwako.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Bw’okeberwa n’osangibwa ng’olina COVID-19, tegeeza Bryan ku T&C Ops know so T&C akuwe obuyambi obwetaagisa era ajja kufuba okulaba nti obeera bulungi era ng’ofuna obuyambi obwetaagisa okuva mu bukulembeze bwaffe).
translated: (Bw’ozuulibwa nga olina ekirwadde kya COVID-19, nsaba otegeeze Bryan munda mu T&C Ops T&C esobole okuyambako mu buwagizi n’okukakasa nti embeera yo efuna okufaayo okusaanidde okuva mu baddukanya emirimu).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Abakolera ku buli ssaawa bajja kusasulwa mu bujjuvu.
translated: Hourly folks bajja kusasulwa mu bujjuvu.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Tukyogeddeko, era twongera okukiggumiza wano nti tujja kussa ekitiibwa mu bye twetema eri bakontulakita baffe ne bannaffe abatukolera buli ssaawa.
translated: Twagamba dda, era tuddamu okweyama okussa ekitiibwa mu bweyamo bwaffe eri abakola kontulakiti ne bannaffe abakozi abakola essaawa.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Buli muntu ajja kusasulwa okusinziira ku ssaawa ze eza bulijjo mu mbeera eza bulijjo.
translated: Buli muntu ajja kusasulwa okusinziira ku ssaawa z’akola bulijjo mu mbeera eza bulijjo.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Muno mulimu n’okutunuulira ekiseera bw’oba ng’oli mulwadde oba nga tosobola kukola.
translated: Kuno kw’ogatta singa oba mulwadde ate nga tosobola kukola.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Bw’oba ng’oyagala okukola, tukuwagira.
translated: Bwoba oyagala okukola, tukuwagira.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Abantu bangi bakozesa emirimu ng’omukutu gw’okweggyako okunyigirizibwa okuva mu bantu/ebintu ebibeetoolodde.
translated: Abantu bangi bakozesa emirimu ng’engeri y’okuyisaamu situleesi yaabwe n’ensi etwetoolodde.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Bye tukola bimatiza era bivaamu ebibala naddala mu kiseera ekiringa kino.
translated: Bye tukola biyinza okuba eby’omuganyulo ogw’ekitalo naddala mu biseera nga bino.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Nkiddamu wano nti kiri gy’oli okwerabirira.
translated: Nate kino kikwata ku kwefaako kwo.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Kye tukusaba kye kino nti yogera ne mukama wo tumanye kye tuyinza okusuubira era tukyuseemu nga bwe kyetaagisa.
translated: Okubuuza kwaffe kwe kuwuliziganya ne maneja wo, tusobole okumanya kye tusuubira era tusobola okutereeza okusinziira ku ekyo.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Emirimu egimu gitwalibwa okubeera egy’omugaso ennyo.
translated: Emirimu egimu gitwalibwa ng’egyetaagisa.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Waliwo ebintu ebitalina kuyimirira.
translated: Waliwo ebintu ebimu bye tulina okusigala nga tukola.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Okuba obulungi, ne tiimu z’okusonda (n’ebirala) bikola emirimu egy’enjawulo egyetaaga obuyambi obulala.
translated: Ttiimu za SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, ne Fundraising (n’endala) zikola emirimu emikulu egiyinza okwetaaga obuyambi obw’enjawulo.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Tuja kutandika kaweefube w’okwekaliriza ebigendererwa byaffe mu kiseera kino era tuseetule bye tutunuulidde kati tusobole okuwagira ebikulu mu bye tukola.
translated: Tujja kutandika enkola n’ebitongole byonna okwekenneenya ebigendererwa ebiriwo kati n’okukyusa essira lyaffe okudda ku kuwagira ebyetaagisa mu bubaka bwaffe.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Tulina bingi eby’okukola, kye twetaaga kwe kwemalira ku pulojekiti ezisinga obukulu.
translated: There's plenty to do for all of us, we just ffenna tujja kussa essira ku pulojekiti ezisinga obukulu.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Okukendeeza ku mbiro tekijja kutukosa gye bujja.
translated: Okukendeeza ku sipiidi kati tekijja kuluma oluvannyuma.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Tetuteekateeka “kukubisaamu budde bwe tukolera nga tusasulira bwe tufiiriddwa” nnawookeera ng’aweddewo.
translated: Tetuteekateeka kugenda “double-time to catch up” nga ssennyiga omukambwe amaze okuyitawo.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Tosuubirwa kukolera budde busukka ku obwo bw’obadde okoleramu olw’okukwata nsalessale atasoboka.
translated: Tojja kusuubirwa kukola ssaawa ez’enjawulo okusobola okutuukiriza nsalesale kati ezitali za mazima.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Tukkiriza nti embeera ekyuse, era tujja kukola ebiruubirirwa ebiggya tukyuse ne nsalessale we kinaaba kyetaagisiza.
translated: Tukkiriza nti embeera zikyuse, era tujja kukola okuteekawo ebiruubirirwa ebipya n’ebiseera we kiba kisaanidde.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Kiki ekinaakolebwa ku Nteekateeka y’Omwaka (Annual Planning)?
translated: Kiki ekibaawo ku APP (Annual Planning)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Okukyusa okudda mu mbeera y’obulamu gye tunaabaamu, n’ebisuubirwa mu budde obukolerwamu buli lunaku, tusuubira okukyusaamu mu nnaku za nsalessale ku ebyo bye twagala okutuukako mu Nteekateeka y’Omwaka gwaffe 2020-2021.
translated: Okusobola okukyusakyusa mu mbeera yaffe empya n’essaawa z’okukola eza buli lunaku ze tusuubira, tugenderera okutereeza ebiseera by’okutuusa Enteekateeka yaffe ey’Omwaka eya 2020-2021.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Ekigendererwa kyaffe kwe kuteesa okwongezaayo enteekateeka yaffe eya 2019-2020 kituwe obudde obulala okukoleramu embalirira abakozi basobole okukulembeza emirimi emikulu, okwerabirira, n’okulabirira abantu baabwe ate ng’era tufaayo ne ku abo abaagala okukolera obudde obutonoko mu wiiki entonotono ezijja.
translated: Ekigendererwa kyaffe kwe kuteesa okwongezaayo enteekateeka yaffe eya 2019-2020 esobozesa obudde obusingawo obw’okukola embalirira okusobozesa abakozi okukulembeza emirimu emikulu, okwerabirira, n’okulabirira abaagalwa baabwe ate nga tusembeza abo abeetaaga oba abaagala okukola enteekateeka ekendeezeddwa okusinga wiiki ezijja.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Okwongezaayo kuno kikendeereza ddala enteekateeka eriwo ku mirimu n’okupeekebwa okumaliriza emirimu okuliwo mu kiseera kino mu kitongole kyonna.
translated: Okugaziya kuno okw’ebiseera kukendeeza nnyo ku mirimu gy’enteekateeka eriwo kati n’okunyigirizibwa mu kitongole kyonna.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Tujja kwanjula ebiteeso byaffe eri Olukiiko Olufuzi mu wiiki ejja era tujja kutegeeza abakiise n’abalala ku bye tulina okuzzaako nga bwe tunaaba tumaze okubikakasa.
translated: Tugenda kwanjula ekiteeso kyaffe eri Board wiiki ejja era tujja kutegeeza ababaka ne ttiimu ku mitendera egiddako amangu ddala nga tumaze okukakasa.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Mwebale nnyo bannange mwenna olw’Enteekateeka n’olw’obukulembeze mu nsonga zonna.
translated: Mwebale nnyo ttiimu ya APP olw'obukulembeze bwammwe mu kino.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Embeera ya woofiisi, okubozi bw’okusiigibwa, n’okuyonja
translated: Embeera ya ofiisi, okubikkulwa, n’okuyonja

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Wiiki ewedde, twategeezebwa nti omu ku bannaffe ow’omu San Francisco alabika yasiigibwa akawuka ka COVID-19.
translated: Wiiki ewedde, twakitegedde nti omu ku bannaffe ababeera mu SF yandiba nga yakwatibwa akawuka ka COVID-19.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Wabula, mu kwegendereza okungi, twafuna eddagala eritta obuwuka ne tufuuyira ekifo kyonna n’ebintu mu woofiisi y’omu San Francisco.
translated: Kyokka, olw’obwegendereza obw’amaanyi, twakozesa abakozi abayonja eddagala eritta akawuka okutta obuwuka ku buli kifo kyonna mu ofiisi y’e San Francisco.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Baakozesa eddagala erikozesebwa okutta obuwuka mu malwariro okutta obuwuka ku buli kintu, mu kifo ewatuukirwa, ebikondo by’omu lifuti ebituuka ku mwaliiro gwa woofiisi yaffe.
translated: Baakozesa eddagala eritta akawuka eriri mu ddwaaliro okutta obuwuka ku buli kifo, awamu ne bbanka z’ekisenge ekiyingirwamu ne lifuti eziyingira wansi waffe.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Bannannyini kizimbe nabo baakozesa engeri zaabwe ez’okulabirira abakozi baabwe.
translated: Ekizimbe kino kikozesa enkola yaakyo ey’okulabirira nga kikozesa ebintu ebiwagira obukuumi bw’abapangisa baabwe.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Tuwulira emirembe nti woofiisi ejja kuba nteeketeeke bulungi we tunaasalirawo okuddayo okukola.
translated: Tuwulira bulungi nti ofiisi ejja kuba etegekeddwa bulungi nga tusazeewo okuddayo.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Woofiisi yaffe ey’omu DC eri mu WeWork, era ng’ekifo ekyo kitulaze ku nteekateeka yaakyo ey’okulwanyisa COVID-19 era n’abakozi bonna ab’omu kifo ekyo enteekateeka eno bagigunyeeko.
translated: Ofiisi yaffe eya DC esangibwa mu WeWork, egabanye enkola yaayo eya COVID-19 naffe n’abakozi bonna abakolera mu DC.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Wiiki ewedde we yaggweerako, woofiisi yaffe ey’omu DC yajjululwa n’ezzibwa mu kifo ekyesuulidde ddala ewala nga tugoberera okuluŋŋamizibwa kwa San Francisco.
translated: We bwazibidde wiiki ewedde, ofiisi yaffe eya DC yasenguka n’egenda mu nteekateeka ey’ewala ennyo ng’ekwatagana n’obulagirizi obwagabana ne San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Era nga bannaffe abamu ab’omu NYC bwe bamanyi, tubadde mu kwogerezeganya tupangise ekifo mu Brooklyn.
translated: Nga abamu ku bannaffe ababeera mu NYC bwe bakimanyi, era tubadde mu kuteesa ku ky’okupangisa ekifo mu Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Okwogerezeganya kuno kukyagenda mu maaso naye kuyinza okulwisibwa.
translated: Okuteesa kuno kugenda mu maaso naye kuyinza okulwawo.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Abamu ku bannaffe bakolera waka ate nga guno gwe mulundi gwabwe ogusoose.
translated: Abamu ku bannaffe bakolera wala omulundi ogusoose.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Abamu ku bannaffe be tukolaganye nabo ebbanga mu ngeri eyo bakimanyi nti kirimu okusoomooza, era bandyagadde okubaako amagezi ge bawa:
translated: Bannaffe abamaze ebbanga nga tuli wala bakimanyi nti kiyinza okuba ennongoosereza, era baagala okukuwa amagezi:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Enkiiko muzikuumire mu bbanga eriri wakati w’essaawa emu oba bbiri.
translated: Obuwanvu bw’enkuŋŋaana bukoma ku ssaawa ezisukka mu emu oba bbiri.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Okusisinkanira ebbanga eddene bwe kuba kwetaagisa, tunula mu ngeri ensisinkana ezo gye zisobola okukutulwakutulwamu ne zidda ku nnaku ez’enjawulo.
translated: Bwe kiba nti kyetaagisa okumala ebbanga eddene, lowooza ku ngeri gye ziyinza okukutukamu mu nnaku eziwerako.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Buli lukiiko luteekeko ensonga, tegeka ebyokuteesaako era weereza ebyetaaga okusomako ng’obudde bukyali.
translated: Lambulula bulungi olukiiko, beera n’enteekateeka, era oweereze ebitabo by’okusoma nga bukyali.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Viidiyo gye muba mukulembeza nga mukozesa n’ebirala nga Google Docs ne Zoom okuyambako mu kuwuliziganya okwo okw’obuliwo.
translated: Fuula vidiyo ekintu ekisookerwako, ng’olina ebikozesebwa nga Google Docs ne Zoom okusobola okwanguyiza okukolagana obutereevu n’okuyungibwa.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Mubeere n’omuntu akulemberamu buli lukiiko, omuntu alina okulondoola okwogeraganya n’ebibuuzo ne biweebwa ekiseera era n’okulondoola abalina okwogera ate n’omuntu alina okunokola ebiteesebwa (oba n’okukkaanya mwenna ne mubaako bye munokola).
translated: Mubeere n’omukulembeze okukwasaganya buli lukiiko, omuntu alondoola emboozi okusobola okufuna ebibuuzo n’okulondoola olukalala lw’aboogezi, n’omuntu okuyamba okuwandiika (oba okukola okuwandiika mu nkolagana).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Bw’oba nga weetaaga emizindaalo gy’omu matu, weereza email eri abakola ku bya tekinologiya bakuweereze emizindaalo emirungi.
translated: Weereza email eri tech support bwoba weetaaga headset ennungi.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Kozesa ssente ezikuddizibwa okubeera obulungi ogulemu obumpwakipwaki.
translated: Kozesa ssente zo ez’okuddizibwa mu bulamu obulungi ku mmere ey’akawoowo.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Weeyunge ku mukutu gwa #remoties mu Slack oyogereganye ne banno ku bikwata ku mirimu egigabiddwa
translated: Weegatte ku mukutu gwa #remoties mu Slack okwogera ne banno ku mirimu egyagabibwa

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Ekitongole Ekikola ku nsonga z’Abakozi kitunula mu nsonga y’okuwuliziganyiza ku yintaneeti (webinar-based ergonomics guidance) okusobola okuyambako ku mirimu egigabiddwa mu Kitongole kyonna.
translated: Ttiimu ya HR Operations etunuulidde obulagirizi bw’enkola y’emirimu (ergonomics guidance) okusinziira ku webinar okuwagira okweyongera kw’emirimu egy’okusaasaanyizibwa mu Foundation yonna.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Mu wiiki eyo ewedde, twasaba abaafuna ssente z’okukola emirimu basazeemu emikolo gyonna egisasulirwa Wikimedia gamba nga editathons, okutuusa ng’ekitongole kya WHO kirangiridde nti nnawookeera aweddewo.
translated: Wiiki eno ewedde twasaba bonna abafuna ensimbi z’omukitundu okusazaamu emikolo egy’olukale egyaweebwa ssente okuva mu Wikimedia, gamba nga editathons, okutuusa ng’ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu eky’ensi yonna kirangirira nti ssennyiga ono aweddewo.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Twabategeeza nti tukitegeera bulungi nti okubasaba okusazaamu n’okukugira ebintu ebimu kizibuwaza okukola ku byokukola ebimu bye baategeka era nti tewali muntu ajja kubonerezebwa olw’okulwawo okumaliriza oba okukyusaamu mu byategekebwa.
translated: Twabategeeza nti twakitegeera nti okusaba kwaffe okusazaamu n’obukwakkulizo obulala kuyinza okulemesa okumaliriza emirimu gyabwe egy’okugaba ensimbi gye bakkiriziganyaako era nti tewali muntu yenna yandibonerezebwa olw’okulwawo oba okukyusa mu biruubirirwa ebyo.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Mu wiiki eyo ejja, tujja kulondoola okuluŋŋamizibwa okulala ku Wikimania ne ku ssemasomo nnamiramwa ate n’ezo ez’omu bitundu ebirala.
translated: Wiiki eno ejja tujja kugoberera n’obulagirizi obw’enjawulo ku Wikimania n’enkiiko endala ez’omu kitundu n’ez’omulamwa ez’omu kitundu.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Kye tusinga okulaba mu bannaffe wonna mu nsi kiri nti bannaffe banakuwavu olw’okusazaamu okw’engeri eyo naye ate bawewuka bwe bateegeera nti balina kwemalira ku ebyo eby’omu kitundu kyabwe, Wikimedia n’ebirala.
translated: Endowooza ey’awamu okuva okwetoloola ensi yonna erabika nga zombi nnaku olw’okutaataaganyizibwa naye obuweerero olw’obutangaavu n’obusobozi okussa essira ku bitundu byabwe, Wikimedia n’ebirala.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Mu ebyo ebijja mu maaso, CRT ekola butaweera okuteekawo omuko ku Meta-Wiki okuteerawo abantu ebbanga okulondoola engeri gye bakwatiddwako n’okugoberera ebyempuliziganya yaffe nabo.
translated: Okugenda mu maaso, CRT ekola okuteekawo omuko ku Meta-Wiki okuwa ekifo eri abantu b’omukitundu okulondoola enkosa n’okugoberera empuliziganya yaffe nabo.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Okubeera mu mpuliziganya ku nsonga ezikwata ku COVID-19
translated: Okusigala nga tukwatagana okwetoloola ensonga ezikwata ku COVID-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Tujja kubayita nga tuyitira mu kalenda zammwe mu lukiiko olw’enjawulo ku Lwokuna olujja, ku ssaawa 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT.
translated: Tujja kuba tuweereza okuyita ku kalenda zo ku Lwokuna olujja, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT mu lukiiko lw'abakozi olw'enjawulo.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Tujja kukosesa ekiseera kino okugabana ku nsonga endala, okwanukula ebibuuzo byammwe era tumaleyo obudde butonotono nga tunyumyamu.
translated: Tujja kukozesa obudde buno okugabana ebipya ebirala, okuddamu ebibuuzo byo n'okumala akaseera nga tukwatagana ne bannaffe.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Ensonga eno tugirimu ffenna era ffenna tulina okuyambagana mu ngeri yonna esoboka.
translated: Tuli mu kino nga tuli wamu era wano okuyamba wadde nga tusobola.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Ebyo nga biri awo, osobola okusanga obubaka buno ku email ne ku mikutu emirala egiriko obubaka obwekwanya ku COVID-19, ne ku Office Wiki.
translated: Mu kiseera kino, osobola okugenda mu maaso n’okuzuula amawulire okuva ku email eno, n’amawulire amalala gonna amakulu agakwata ku COVID-19, ku Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT kijja kufuba okuteeka obubaka obwakasembyeyo okufunika mu kifo kimu.
translated: CRT ejja kukuuma empapula zino nga zitereezeddwa n’amawulire gonna mu kifo kimu.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Tufuba era okukola okufuna empuliziganya buli kiseera n’abakozi abali mu mawanga agakoseddwa ennyo mu kiseera kino.
translated: Tukola n’okukuuma empuliziganya eya bulijjo n’abakozi ababeera mu nsi ezikoseddwa ennyo mu kiseera kino.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Bw’oba ng’olina ekibuuzo kyonna ku bikwata ku ntambula, emikolo, omulimu gwonna oba okusoomoozebwa ku kukola ku by’olina okukolako, oba ekintu ekirala kyonna kye weetaaga okukuyambamu, tolonzalonza kututegeeza era kolagana ne CRT.
translated: Bw’oba olina ekibuuzo kyonna ku ntambula, emikolo, omulimu omukulu, oba okusoomoozebwa kw’okubikka, oba ekintu ekirala kyonna ky’oyinza okwetaaga obuyambi, nsaba tolwawo kutegeeza n’okukola ne CRT.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Tuli bulindaala okuyamba n’okukolagana naawe ku nsonga eyeetaagisa.
translated: Tuli wano okuyambako okuwa obuwagizi n'okukwatagana nga bwe kyetaagisa.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Bw’oba ng’olina ensonga ey’ekyama oba ey’okwegendereza, tukusaba oweereze email ewa Bryan Judan, Ssenkulu w’Emirimu mu Nsi Yonna (Director of HR International Global Operations).
translated: Bw’oba olina ensonga ey’ekyama oba ey’amaanyi, wandiika ku email Bryan Judan - Dayirekita wa HR International Global Operations.
